hymn-lyrics:
1.DZIDZISAI vadzidzisi,

Imi vanhu vake!

Mudzidzise izwi rake

Kudzo dzose nyika.



2. Asi ngoro yezwi rako

Ngaifambe iyo;

Kudzo dzose nzvimbo, Jesu,

Ngaifambe iyo.



3. Vadzidzisi dzidzisai,

Imi vanhu vake!

Ngarinzwiwe dama rake

Navo vanhu vose.



4. Asi dama rako, Ishe,

Ngarisvike muno;

Ngarikwane nyika yose,

Kudzo dzose nzwimbo.



5.Asi nyika ndiri kure,

Ngadzizive idzo;

Dzitarire kuna Jesu,

Dzichitenda Iye.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.DZIDZISAI vadzidzisi,<EOV><EOV>Imi vanhu vake!<EOV><EOV>Mudzidzise izwi rake<EOV><EOV>Kudzo dzose nyika.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Asi ngoro yezwi rako<EOV><EOV>Ngaifambe iyo;<EOV><EOV>Kudzo dzose nzvimbo, Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Ngaifambe iyo.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Vadzidzisi dzidzisai,<EOV><EOV>Imi vanhu vake!<EOV><EOV>Ngarinzwiwe dama rake<EOV><EOV>Navo vanhu vose.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Asi dama rako, Ishe,<EOV><EOV>Ngarisvike muno;<EOV><EOV>Ngarikwane nyika yose,<EOV><EOV>Kudzo dzose nzwimbo.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5.Asi nyika ndiri kure,<EOV><EOV>Ngadzizive idzo;<EOV><EOV>Dzitarire kuna Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Dzichitenda Iye.

hymn-lyrics:
1.TINE dama rako Mwari,

Noupenyu naro;

Tinoziva zvakaipa,

Muponisi wedu.



2. Rakafamba iro dama,

Richafamba iro;

Ose marudzi avanhu,

Amirira iro.



3. Dzinokundwa hondo dzose.

Neri dama Ishe:

Ichazara nyika yese,

Neri dama Ishe.



4. Dzose nzwizi dzapanyika

Dzichafara naro;

Navanhu vose venyika

Vopfumiswa naro.



5. Dzichapera hondo dzose

Nezwi rako Mwari;

Kuchauya kuwadzana,

Nezwi rako Mwari.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.TINE dama rako Mwari,<EOV><EOV>Noupenyu naro;<EOV><EOV>Tinoziva zvakaipa,<EOV><EOV>Muponisi wedu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Rakafamba iro dama,<EOV><EOV>Richafamba iro;<EOV><EOV>Ose marudzi avanhu,<EOV><EOV>Amirira iro.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Dzinokundwa hondo dzose.<EOV><EOV>Neri dama Ishe:<EOV><EOV>Ichazara nyika yese,<EOV><EOV>Neri dama Ishe.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Dzose nzwizi dzapanyika<EOV><EOV>Dzichafara naro;<EOV><EOV>Navanhu vose venyika<EOV><EOV>Vopfumiswa naro.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Dzichapera hondo dzose<EOV><EOV>Nezwi rako Mwari;<EOV><EOV>Kuchauya kuwadzana,<EOV><EOV>Nezwi rako Mwari.

hymn-lyrics:
1.SIMUDZA kufunga kwedu

Mweya woutsvene;

Tifunge mabasa ako,

Tidzidzese nawo,



2. Iro zuva rokuuya,

Ngarisvike zvino;

Kuti iwo moto wako

Usvike kwatiri.



3. Tambanudza ndimi dzedu,

Dzidzidziswe newe;

Tizviteurire.



4. Kusangana kwamashoko,

Takakumirira;

Uya mweya woutsvene,

Ita basa pano.



5. Uya nesimba zvikuru,

Zadza iyi nzvimbo;

Tigonzwa masimba ako

Nokuita kwako.



6. Chikurumidza kuuya,

Mweya woutsvene;

Chinzwa miteuro yedu,

Utiburukire.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.SIMUDZA kufunga kwedu<EOV><EOV>Mweya woutsvene;<EOV><EOV>Tifunge mabasa ako,<EOV><EOV>Tidzidzese nawo,<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Iro zuva rokuuya,<EOV><EOV>Ngarisvike zvino;<EOV><EOV>Kuti iwo moto wako<EOV><EOV>Usvike kwatiri.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Tambanudza ndimi dzedu,<EOV><EOV>Dzidzidziswe newe;<EOV><EOV>Tizviteurire.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Kusangana kwamashoko,<EOV><EOV>Takakumirira;<EOV><EOV>Uya mweya woutsvene,<EOV><EOV>Ita basa pano.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Uya nesimba zvikuru,<EOV><EOV>Zadza iyi nzvimbo;<EOV><EOV>Tigonzwa masimba ako<EOV><EOV>Nokuita kwako.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>6. Chikurumidza kuuya,<EOV><EOV>Mweya woutsvene;<EOV><EOV>Chinzwa miteuro yedu,<EOV><EOV>Utiburukire.

hymn-lyrics:
1.MWEYA Mutsvene waMwari!

Gara muno mumba;

Buruka zvino nesimba,

Uya, Mweya, uya!



2. Uya Mweya kufanana

Kupenya kwezuva;

Vhenekera moyo yedu,

Onisa kuipa.



3. Onisa rushavashava,

Nezvirwere zvose,

Titungamire panzira,

Panoenda vatsvene.



4. Uya serimi romoto,

Pisa moyo yedu,

Tichive zviteuriro

Kuna Ishe wedu.



5. Uya Mweya kufanana

Dova rokudenga,

Mwoyo isingabereke

Ive namapudzi.



6. Uya senjiva yedenga,

Utivumbamire

Nemapapiro orudo,

Noruregerero.



7 Uya sedutu remhepo,

Netsitsi nengoni,

Kuti vanhu vakuone,

Nokupenya kwako.



8. Mweya Mutsvene waMwari!

Tarasika isu;

Buruka zvino nesimba,

Uya, Mweya, uya!

hymn-lyrics:
1.NDINOBVA kwamuri, ndinoenda kudenga,

Ndinoenda kuimba yaBaba;

Kune iyi imba inoutswene ‘ukuru,

Ndinokugadzirirai nzwimbo.



2. Kana ndichienda, ndokudzokerai,

A ‘vanhu venyika havaone:

Kana ndichidzoka ndokugam’chirai,

Tigare panzwimbo ndinemi.



3.Iri ‘zwi raMambo, riri ‘zwi ro’faro,

Farai! Vatendi, farai!

Ishe wakaenda, asi achadzoka,

Apinze kudenga imi mose.



4. Ipapo togara pautsvene kwazvo,

Navazhinjizhinji chokwadi;

Neredu ir’zwi tiri pana vamwe,

Tokudza Ishe wokudenga.

hymn-lyrics:
1.WAKAMUKA Ishe Jesu,

Wakabuda pane guva,

Wakamuka noumambo,

Wakamuka pano rufu.



2. Jesu woupenyu hwose,

Haunokunzwa kuora,

Uchagara noupenyu,

Unofara nokufara.



3.Jesu tinokurumbidza,

Nako kufa wakambofa;

Dzose hondo wadzikunda,

Nero zuva wakamuka.



4.Jesu zvirokwazvo zvako

Zvinoonekwa zvokwadi;

Waita vatendi vako

Vave vazhinji zvikuru.



5. Vagoti nomusi wako

Zvinoonekwa zvokwadi;

Waita vatendi vako

Vave vazhinji zvikuru.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.WAKAMUKA Ishe Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Wakabuda pane guva,<EOV><EOV>Wakamuka noumambo,<EOV><EOV>Wakamuka pano rufu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Jesu woupenyu hwose,<EOV><EOV>Haunokunzwa kuora,<EOV><EOV>Uchagara noupenyu,<EOV><EOV>Unofara nokufara.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3.Jesu tinokurumbidza,<EOV><EOV>Nako kufa wakambofa;<EOV><EOV>Dzose hondo wadzikunda,<EOV><EOV>Nero zuva wakamuka.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4.Jesu zvirokwazvo zvako<EOV><EOV>Zvinoonekwa zvokwadi;<EOV><EOV>Waita vatendi vako<EOV><EOV>Vave vazhinji zvikuru.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Vagoti nomusi wako<EOV><EOV>Zvinoonekwa zvokwadi;<EOV><EOV>Waita vatendi vako<EOV><EOV>Vave vazhinji zvikuru.

hymn-lyrics:
1.TINOFARA nhasi,

Isu tinotenda,

Tirumbidze Ishe wedu

Nokumuka kwake.



2. Uchiri muupenyu,

Nyamba wakambofa;

Ndorupi rukundo guva

Nesimba rokufa?



3.Rose basa rake,

Rose wakapedza;

Ruponiso waruwana,

Tingapone tose.



4.Farai vatendi,

Hoyo Mambo wenyu!

Ngakuberekwe mapudzi

Okutenda kwenyu.



5. Ikoko kudenga,

Anokusuwai,

Nokuti iye wamuka

Newe ungamuke.



6. Unodiiko iwe

Wakaipa wafa?

Chinhu chatarirwa iwe

Icho chokumuka.



7. Rasa nharo dzako

Uya tenda iye,

Dombochimuka pakufa,

Unokuponisa.

hymn-selector: Hymn 31    KRISTU Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo
hymn-lyrics:
1.KRISTU Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo!

Kristu Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo!

Wakatakura kuipa kwedu,

Wapedza basa rake.

Wakakunda kufa, wakakunda kufa.

Areruya! Areruya! Areruya! Amen.



2. Kristu Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo!

Kristu Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo!

Ngavafare vanhu vose.

Ngavaimbe pamwe chete.

Wamuka nhasi, Wamuka nhasi.

Areruya! Areruya! Areruya! Amen.



 



3. Kristu Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo!

Kristu Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo!

Wakapedza basa guru,

Tose takawana tsitsi,

Hosana kwaAri! Hosasa kwaAri!

Areruya! Areruya! Areruya! Amen.



 



4. Kristu Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo!

Kristu Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo!

Ngavaimbe vanhu vose,

Ngavaimbe norufaro,

Nziyo dzakanaka, nziyo dzakanaka.

Areruya! Areruya! Areruya! Amen.

Wamuka kwazvo!<EOV><EOV>Wakapedza basa guru,<EOV><EOV>Tose takawana tsitsi,<EOV><EOV>Hosana kwaAri! Hosasa kwaAri!<EOV><EOV>Areruya! Areruya! Areruya! Amen.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV> <EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Kristu Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo!<EOV><EOV>Kristu Wamuka nhasi! Wamuka kwazvo!<EOV><EOV>Ngavaimbe vanhu vose,<EOV><EOV>Ngavaimbe norufaro,<EOV><EOV>Nziyo dzakanaka, nziyo dzakanaka.<EOV><EOV>Areruya! Areruya! Areruya! Amen.

hymn-lyrics:
1.MWEYA wangu uno Muponisi,

Ndakasunungurwa;

Musununguri ngandinaniswe,

Ndichagam’chirwasu?



Korus

Ndoda, ndoda, ndoda

Mwari muyamuri uri wangu:

Ndakatengwa neropa raIshe,

Ndava wake chose.



2. Nengoni ndichagam’chira tsitsi,

Rudo rwako Kristu,

Rwaukunda moyo wangu kwazvo,

Ndichavimba newe.



3. Unoziva kusasimba kwangu,

Ndotya kurasika,

Asi iwe uri simba rangu,

Unondipa simba.



4. Hongu, Ishe, tipe isu tose,

Ngoni dzako nhasi,

Nezvinobva pamwoyo tichiti:

“Ndichava waKristu”.



5. Vakauya vamwe vachibunza:

“Tingapone here?”

“Hongu, ndinoda muponisiwe”

Nesu tinodaro.

hymn-lyrics:
1.UNA vanhu vako, Mwari

Kudzo dzose nguva;

Unovachengeta iwe,

Pane nzvimbo dzose.



2. Kana voyambuka nzizi,

Uve navo iwe;

Kana vapiswa nemoto,

Vanochengetwa newe.



3. Pavanokutambudzika

Vanosimba newe;

Napane zvinovaruma,

Unovachengeta.



4.Ishe vatarire iwe,

Ivo vanhu vako;

Vanotenda, vanofunga,

Ivo vanhu vako.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.UNA vanhu vako, Mwari<EOV><EOV>Kudzo dzose nguva;<EOV><EOV>Unovachengeta iwe,<EOV><EOV>Pane nzvimbo dzose.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Kana voyambuka nzizi,<EOV><EOV>Uve navo iwe;<EOV><EOV>Kana vapiswa nemoto,<EOV><EOV>Vanochengetwa newe.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Pavanokutambudzika<EOV><EOV>Vanosimba newe;<EOV><EOV>Napane zvinovaruma,<EOV><EOV>Unovachengeta.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4.Ishe vatarire iwe,<EOV><EOV>Ivo vanhu vako;<EOV><EOV>Vanotenda, vanofunga,<EOV><EOV>Ivo vanhu vako.

hymn-lyrics:
1.RAKANAKA iro zuva

Randakatenda kuna’she!

Mwoyo wangu fara zvako,

Udza vanhu vose iro.



Korus

Ranaka, ranaka, raJesu wakandishamba.

Iye wakandidzidzisa kurinda nokuteura,

Ranaka, ranaka, raJesu wakandishamba.



2. Chanaka chitenderano

Chinondisunga kuna’she!

Ngaizadzwe imba yako

Norwiyo rwandinoimba.



3. Rakapera basa guru;

Ndiriwake, uri wangu:

Wakandizvuva norudo

Ndikamutevera ini.



4. Mwoyo wangu! chizorora!

Wakatsaukaniswa kare:

Rega kubva kuna Ishe,

Kwa’ri zvose zvakanaka.



5. Nokudenga kwakachinzwa

I’chitenderano changu;

Napakufa ndingatende

Nokuti ini ndiri wake.

hymn-lyrics:
1.BABA ndiri mwana wako,

Kana ndakatadza;

Ndinochema mberi kwako,

Baba ndiregerere.



2 Zvitadzo zvangu zvizhinji,

Hazvingaverengwi;

Ndinozviisa kwauri;

Baba ndiregerere.



3.Mirau yako ndakatyora,

Iwe ndakuzvidza;

Mununuri ndamurasa,

Baba ndiregerere.



4.Ndakatadza nokureva,

Ndakatadza kufunga,

Ndakatadza namabasa;

Baba ndiregerere.



5. Kana ndanga ndafanira

Nokukurumbidza,

Ndatadza nokukanganwa,

Baba ndiregerere.



6. Nezvakaipa zvizhinji

Baba ndakatadza,

Ndakakunyadzisa iwe,

Baba ndiregerere.



7. Uri Mwari une ngoni,

Dzisina kupera,

Naizvozvo ndinochema,

Baba ndiregerere.

hymn-lyrics:
1.MWARI ndiri murombo,

Ndiri murombo wako.

Mwari ndiri nherera,

Ndiri nherera yako.

Nezvakaipa zvangu,

Zvandiita nherera.



2. Iwe Mwari Mutswene,

Netsitsi dzako Baba,

Wandipa Mwana wako

Kuti azondifira,

Kuti andiponese

Neropa rake roga.



3.Iwe Mwana waMwari

Chindiponisa ini,

Kuzvakaipa zvangu,

Ndinoremerwa kwazvo.

Ndiwe Musununguri

Ngandinunurwe newe.



4.Iwe Mwanakomana

WaMwari Baba vangu,

Ndiwe wakandifira

Pamuchinjikwa wako.

Wakaoniswa nhamu

Kuti kupone ini.



5. Mwari ndinomutenda

Jesu ndinokutenda

Newe Mweya Mutsvene

Muri vatatu mumwe.

Ngandirumbidze kwazvo

Kusingaperi Baba.

hymn-lyrics:
1.UYA mwoyo wangu,

Uya kuna’she wangu;

Uya nhasi wakaipa,

Usaende pano rufu,

Uya mwoyo wangu.



2. Chema mwoyo wangu,

Nezvakaipa zvangu;

Zvakaipa zvinonyadza,

Asi ini ndichinazvo,

Chema mwoyo wangu.



3.Teura mwoyo wangu,

Uya kuMununuri;

Daidza iwe kuna;she,

Unonzwa iye kudenga;

Teura mwoyo wangu.



4.Imba mwoyo wangu,

Tenda kuna’She wangu;

Wakambouya panyika,

Kuti ndiende kedenga;

Imba mwoyo wangu.



5. Fara mwoyo wangu,

KuMununuri wangu,

Wakauya kundifira,

Zvino wakandiponesa,

Fara mwoyo wangu.

hymn-lyrics:
1.ISHE ndinzwe nokufara

Ndinzwe netsitsi dzako

Dzaunopa vanhu vose

Ngadziuye pandiri, pandiri



2. Rega kundisiya, Baba,

Kana ndiri mutadzi,

Ndinokuipa pamoyo,

Asi uya pandiri, pandiri.



3. Uya pano, Muponisi!

Ngandichengetwe newe;

Kana uchindishevedza,

Ndichauya kwauri, kwauri



4.Mweya Mutsvene wa Mwari!

Rega Kundipfuura,

Ngandione ndiri bofu,

Taura izwi resimba, resimba.



5. Rudo rwako Mwari Baba,

Ropa raIshe wangu,

Nokuwadzana KwoMweya.

Kungavepo kwandiri, kwandiri.

hymn-lyrics:
1. NDOZVIISA pana Jesu

Zvakaipa zvangu;

Anonditakurira,

Mutoro mukuru:

Ndouyisa kuna Jesu

Mhosva dzangu dzose,

Ndinoda kushambidzwa,

Nditsveniswe kwazvo.



2. Ndokumbira kuna Jesu

Zvose zvandashaya,

Anorapa zvirwere,

Anondinunura.

Ndouyisa kuna Jesu

Dambudziko rangu,

Anondisunungura

Tinogoverana.



3. Nozorora pana Jesu

Mweya wakaneta,

Ndorinda zvakanaka

Pachipfuva chake;

Zvikuru ndinomuda

Jesu Kristu Ishe;

Ndiye Mufudzi wangu,

Ndiye Muyamuri.



4. Ndoda kuva saJesu,

Wanga akapfava,

Ndiye mwana mutsvene,

WaBaba kudenga.

Ndoda kuva saJesu,

Ndoda kudzidziswa

Ndigomukurumbidza,

Pamwe nengirozi.



x8

hymn-lyrics:
1. MUFUDZI ndiropafadze,

Ndiri hwayana yako;

Ndichengete pausiku,

Kudzamarare mangwana.



2. Wandiperekedza nhasi,

Ndokutenda maurano;

Wakandipa imba yangu,

Wakandipa nokudya.



3. Ndiregere zvakaipa,

Fadzisa hama dzangu;

Ngandiendeko kudenga,

Pandinoda kugara.

hymn-lyrics:
1. CHIRIKO chikomo kure

Kunze kwoyo musha,

Paakaroverwa Ishe,

Paakatifira.



2. Hatizivi isu vanhu

Kurwadza kwakadii;

Wakarembera pamuti

Nenzira yavanhu.



3. Wakafa kuti tipone,

Tive vakanaka,

Kuti tiende kudenga,

Tiponeswe naye.



4. Pakanga pasina mumwe

Wokutinunura,

Ndiye wakava nesimba

Kutipinza denga.



5. Jesu wakatida isu

Tisati tamuda,

Takafanira kutenda

Nokumuda kwazvo.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. CHIRIKO chikomo kure<EOV><EOV>Kunze kwoyo musha,<EOV><EOV>Paakaroverwa Ishe,<EOV><EOV>Paakatifira.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Hatizivi isu vanhu<EOV><EOV>Kurwadza kwakadii;<EOV><EOV>Wakarembera pamuti<EOV><EOV>Nenzira yavanhu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Wakafa kuti tipone,<EOV><EOV>Tive vakanaka,<EOV><EOV>Kuti tiende kudenga,<EOV><EOV>Tiponeswe naye.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Pakanga pasina mumwe<EOV><EOV>Wokutinunura,<EOV><EOV>Ndiye wakava nesimba<EOV><EOV>Kutipinza denga.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Jesu wakatida isu<EOV><EOV>Tisati tamuda,<EOV><EOV>Takafanira kutenda<EOV><EOV>Nokumuda kwazvo.

hymn-lyrics:
1. NDOUYA kuna Jesu,

Anondifarisa,

Ane tsitsi neni,

Panhamu yangu.



Korus

Ndouya kuna Jesu,

Ndinogofara,

Anoshevedzera

Vaduku seni.



2. Ndouya kuna Jesu,

Anonzwa kwandiri,

Anondida kwazvo,

Wandiyamura.



3. Ndouya kuna Jesu,

Anondibatsira,

Anditungamire

Kunyika yake.



4. Ikoko kudenga

Ndichava mutsvene,

Ndichaona Jesu,

M’ponisi wangu.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. NDOUYA kuna Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Anondifarisa,<EOV><EOV>Ane tsitsi neni,<EOV><EOV>Panhamu yangu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus<EOV><EOV>Ndouya kuna Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Ndinogofara,<EOV><EOV>Anoshevedzera<EOV><EOV>Vaduku seni.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Ndouya kuna Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Anonzwa kwandiri,<EOV><EOV>Anondida kwazvo,<EOV><EOV>Wandiyamura.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Ndouya kuna Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Anondibatsira,<EOV><EOV>Anditungamire<EOV><EOV>Kunyika yake.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Ikoko kudenga<EOV><EOV>Ndichava mutsvene,<EOV><EOV>Ndichaona Jesu,<EOV><EOV>M’ponisi wangu.

hymn-lyrics:
1. JESU , unoshevedza vaduku,

Ndinouya;

Bata ruoko rwangu norwako,

Muponisi

Nditungamire kana ndotsauka,

Ndabatwa naSatani muvengi.



2. Ndinofunga kuti tsoka dzako

Dzakanaka;

Dzanga dzichifamba pane nzira,

Nzira yangu;

Iwe wanga uchiri mucheche,

Wakavakudza vazvari vako.



3. Jesu ndipe mwoyo wokufunga,

Muponisi;

Somwoyo wako mwoyo michena

Gara neni

Shure kwezo ndinogokuziva,

Ndinogokura nokuchenjera.



4. Ndinogokurumbidza, M’ponisi,

Misi yose;

Pakutamba napabasa rangu,

Ndichaimba.

Ndiyamure pakuedzwa kwangu,

Ndidzidzise yose mirau yako.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. JESU , unoshevedza vaduku,<EOV><EOV>Ndinouya;<EOV><EOV>Bata ruoko rwangu norwako,<EOV><EOV>Muponisi<EOV><EOV>Nditungamire kana ndotsauka,<EOV><EOV>Ndabatwa naSatani muvengi.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Ndinofunga kuti tsoka dzako<EOV><EOV>Dzakanaka;<EOV><EOV>Dzanga dzichifamba pane nzira,<EOV><EOV>Nzira yangu;<EOV><EOV>Iwe wanga uchiri mucheche,<EOV><EOV>Wakavakudza vazvari vako.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Jesu ndipe mwoyo wokufunga,<EOV><EOV>Muponisi;<EOV><EOV>Somwoyo wako mwoyo michena<EOV><EOV>Gara neni<EOV><EOV>Shure kwezo ndinogokuziva,<EOV><EOV>Ndinogokura nokuchenjera.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Ndinogokurumbidza, M’ponisi,<EOV><EOV>Misi yose;<EOV><EOV>Pakutamba napabasa rangu,<EOV><EOV>Ndichaimba.<EOV><EOV>Ndiyamure pakuedzwa kwangu,<EOV><EOV>Ndidzidzise yose mirau yako.

1. NDIROPAFADZE Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Dzidzisa mwoyo wangu;<EOV><EOV>Ndoda mwoyo muchena<EOV><EOV>Mufudzi, ndichengete.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Ndiri muduku asi,<EOV><EOV>Wakadaidza vose;<EOV><EOV>Ndipe zvokudya zvangu,<EOV><EOV>Mufudzi, ndichengete.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Ndiyamure M’ponisi;<EOV><EOV>Handina simba ini:<EOV><EOV>Ndinotenda kwauri:<EOV><EOV>Mufudzi, ndichengete.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Ndiyamure M’ponisi;<EOV><EOV>Handina simba ini:<EOV><EOV>Ndinotenda kwauri:<EOV><EOV>Mufudzi, ndichengete.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Handidi kutsaukana,<EOV><EOV>Ndoda kugara newe;<EOV><EOV>Panzwimbo yakanaka;<EOV><EOV>Mufudzi, ndichengete.

hymn-lyrics:
1. AMAI navana

Vauya kuna Jesu,

Vadzidzi vavadzivisa

Vachiti, “Ibvai!”

Asi Jesu haabvumi

Wati kuna vakukutu,

“Regai vaduku musavarambise”.



2. Ndinovagam’chira,

Ndinogovafungata,

Ndichava mufudzi wavo,

Musavarambise;

Ndinoda vaduku vose

Vagare upenyu neni

“Regai vaduku musavarambise”.



3. Jesu wakapfava,

Wakavaropafadza,

Nyamba zviuru zvevana

Vasati vamuziva;

Havana matama ake,

Havanzwe kuti wadaro,

“Regai vaduku musavarambise”.



4. Tinokuteura

Kuti marudzi ose

Asiye vamwari vavo

Auye kwauri.

Uvavhenekere, Mwari,

Uve navo noupenyu,

Uvadzidzise vauye kwauri.

hymn-lyrics:
1. NGUVA yakanakisisa

Yokukurumbidza,

Kana tadzoredzaniswa

Pam’soro kudenga:

Ndizvozvo tichinzwa manzwi

Echisimbisiso,

Chokuti kana tikafa

Pane ino nyika.



Korus

Tinosangana kudenga

Neropa raJesu:

Nokutenda kuna Jesu

Tichasanganiswa.



2. Kunakisa korugare

Rwakasunga mwoyo:

Isu kana taungana

Pazita raKristu

Mwanakomana waBaba

Wakakomborerwa,

Chifungidziro chokuti

Tichasanganiswa.



3. Hongu, nokukurumbidza;

Kukunda madzudzo;

Tsoka dzedu dzakaneta

Dzichayambukira

Zambuko rine ndarama

Pavakagarira,

Avo vanotida isu,

Ruripo rufaro.



4. Kana takatsaukaniswa

Kukange kwasvika

Namazuva mashomana

Makore mashoma

Tichava naye M’ponisi,

Pane idzo nzvimbo

Dzatinoreverwa kunzi

Tichasanganiswa.

hymn-selector: Hymn 110     RADOKA zuva, garai neni, Tenzi
hymn-lyrics:
1. RADOKA zuva, garai neni, Tenzi

Dima rasvika, Tenzi, gara neni,

Panguva yokurara ino, Baba

Ngandikotseke nekusingaperi.



2. Ngandimutsvake nguva dzese, Tenzi,

Ngetsitsi dzenyu dzakazondipfuwa,

Ngetsitsi dzenyu ndakapiwa zvese,

Mudima guru, garai neni, Baba.



3. Handichakutyi kuipa, Baba wangu,

Handina nhamo kana neurombo,

Nerufu harutyisi mweya wangu,

Mudima guru, garai neni, Baba.



4. Ngandipangudzwe nzira yakanaka,

Chenanyi, Tenzi, mune mwoyo wangu,

Kuedza kwenyu ngakudzinge dima,

Mudima guru, garai neni, Baba.



5. Upenyu hwedu hunopfupisiswa,

Rufaro rwedu rwuchapera pasi,

Zvese zvepasi zvichatsakatika,

Mudima guru, garai nei Baba
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. RADOKA zuva, garai neni, Tenzi<EOV><EOV>Dima rasvika, Tenzi, gara neni,<EOV><EOV>Panguva yokurara ino, Baba<EOV><EOV>Ngandikotseke nekusingaperi.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Ngandimutsvake nguva dzese, Tenzi,<EOV><EOV>Ngetsitsi dzenyu dzakazondipfuwa,<EOV><EOV>Ngetsitsi dzenyu ndakapiwa zvese,<EOV><EOV>Mudima guru, garai neni, Baba.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Handichakutyi kuipa, Baba wangu,<EOV><EOV>Handina nhamo kana neurombo,<EOV><EOV>Nerufu harutyisi mweya wangu,<EOV><EOV>Mudima guru, garai neni, Baba.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Ngandipangudzwe nzira yakanaka,<EOV><EOV>Chenanyi, Tenzi, mune mwoyo wangu,<EOV><EOV>Kuedza kwenyu ngakudzinge dima,<EOV><EOV>Mudima guru, garai neni, Baba.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Upenyu hwedu hunopfupisiswa,<EOV><EOV>Rufaro rwedu rwuchapera pasi,<EOV><EOV>Zvese zvepasi zvichatsakatika,<EOV><EOV>Mudima guru, garai nei Baba

hymn-lyrics:
1. Mukovi wazvo zviro zvose

Tendanyi imwi, mwakasikwa,

Mugere pane iri pasi.



2. Tendanyi, imwi Ingirosi,

Dzigere kuna Baba wedu,

Tendanyi Baba, Murumbwana,

Nekune Mweyawo Mutsvene.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. Mukovi wazvo zviro zvose<EOV><EOV>Tendanyi imwi, mwakasikwa,<EOV><EOV>Mugere pane iri pasi.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Tendanyi, imwi Ingirosi,<EOV><EOV>Dzigere kuna Baba wedu,<EOV><EOV>Tendanyi Baba, Murumbwana,<EOV><EOV>Nekune Mweyawo Mutsvene.

hymn-lyrics:
1. BABA wedu mwakazviita,

Mwakatipa Muponesi,

Murumbwana wenyu umwe,

Kuti atipangidzire

Nzira yekudenga renyu.



2. Kuti tichikarakadza

Ngevabari vedu kare,

Vaitambudzika diko

Ngekushaya nguva yokudya

Pfumvu, nhamo, nzara hayo.



3. Havasaiziva Mwari

Kana Murumbwana wake

Havasakamuombera,

Vakagara mune dima

Havasakaona mwenje.



4. Zvino isu tinotenda

Tiri vana venyu Baba,

Vanomuombera kwese,

Uko tinofamba isu,

Tine muchengeti, Jesu.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. BABA wedu mwakazviita,<EOV><EOV>Mwakatipa Muponesi,<EOV><EOV>Murumbwana wenyu umwe,<EOV><EOV>Kuti atipangidzire<EOV><EOV>Nzira yekudenga renyu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Kuti tichikarakadza<EOV><EOV>Ngevabari vedu kare,<EOV><EOV>Vaitambudzika diko<EOV><EOV>Ngekushaya nguva yokudya<EOV><EOV>Pfumvu, nhamo, nzara hayo.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Havasaiziva Mwari<EOV><EOV>Kana Murumbwana wake<EOV><EOV>Havasakamuombera,<EOV><EOV>Vakagara mune dima<EOV><EOV>Havasakaona mwenje.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Zvino isu tinotenda<EOV><EOV>Tiri vana venyu Baba,<EOV><EOV>Vanomuombera kwese,<EOV><EOV>Uko tinofamba isu,<EOV><EOV>Tine muchengeti, Jesu.

hymn-lyrics:
1. BABA wedu tinofara

Kuva pano nyamusi,

Mumba yenyu nzvimbo tsvene,

Kumukudza Mambo wedu:

Zviro zvese zvakanaka

Zvinopiwa kunesu,

Kuti tese timudise

Nekufara zvikuru.



2. Mangwanani neusiku

Tinomupa zvitendo

Nezvekudya nezvekunwa.

Nemachira akanaka:

Misi yese tinotenda

Ngekudzidza zvizhinji

Nekukana kwakapera.

Tese takomborerwa.



3. Tinokoya ndimwi, Jesu,

Hamusakambotadza.

Hamusakatitadzira,

Nguva dzese munotendwa

Muri idi, muri nzira,

Munovakomborera

Vese avo vanomuda

Nekumuteerera.



4. Ndizvo tinomukumbira

Kuti tisandurenyi

Tide zviro zvakanaka

Nekuvenga zvakaipa;

Baba M’tsvene, tinodisa

Rudo rwenyu rwakanaka,

Uwo rwakatifira.



5. Zvino pane nyika yedu

Yozonaka zvikuru,

Ruvheneko rwazosvika

Vanhu vose vapfumiswa

Runyararo rwakauya,

Zvino tava kugara

Ngerudano neukama,

Tina Baba umweyo.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. BABA wedu tinofara<EOV><EOV>Kuva pano nyamusi,<EOV><EOV>Mumba yenyu nzvimbo tsvene,<EOV><EOV>Kumukudza Mambo wedu:<EOV><EOV>Zviro zvese zvakanaka<EOV><EOV>Zvinopiwa kunesu,<EOV><EOV>Kuti tese timudise<EOV><EOV>Nekufara zvikuru.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Mangwanani neusiku<EOV><EOV>Tinomupa zvitendo<EOV><EOV>Nezvekudya nezvekunwa.<EOV><EOV>Nemachira akanaka:<EOV><EOV>Misi yese tinotenda<EOV><EOV>Ngekudzidza zvizhinji<EOV><EOV>Nekukana kwakapera.<EOV><EOV>Tese takomborerwa.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Tinokoya ndimwi, Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Hamusakambotadza.<EOV><EOV>Hamusakatitadzira,<EOV><EOV>Nguva dzese munotendwa<EOV><EOV>Muri idi, muri nzira,<EOV><EOV>Munovakomborera<EOV><EOV>Vese avo vanomuda<EOV><EOV>Nekumuteerera.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Ndizvo tinomukumbira<EOV><EOV>Kuti tisandurenyi<EOV><EOV>Tide zviro zvakanaka<EOV><EOV>Nekuvenga zvakaipa;<EOV><EOV>Baba M’tsvene, tinodisa<EOV><EOV>Rudo rwenyu rwakanaka,<EOV><EOV>Uwo rwakatifira.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Zvino pane nyika yedu<EOV><EOV>Yozonaka zvikuru,<EOV><EOV>Ruvheneko rwazosvika<EOV><EOV>Vanhu vose vapfumiswa<EOV><EOV>Runyararo rwakauya,<EOV><EOV>Zvino tava kugara<EOV><EOV>Ngerudano neukama,<EOV><EOV>Tina Baba umweyo.

hymn-selector: Hymn 106     TENZI , taungana muno mumba yenyu
hymn-lyrics:
1. TENZI , taungana muno mumba yenyu,

Uyaiwo zvatapinda, Tenzi mberi

Kweyu

Iyo mwoyo yedu inomuchemera.

Neyi mweya yedu, Tenzi, inomutarira.



2. Baba, ngatizive kuti muri pano

Ngatirinzwe izwi renyu, razarurwa ndimi.

Tigadzirireyi isu vanhu venyu,

Kuti tafa mutipinze kune musha wenyu.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. TENZI , taungana muno mumba yenyu,<EOV><EOV>Uyaiwo zvatapinda, Tenzi mberi<EOV><EOV>Kweyu<EOV><EOV>Iyo mwoyo yedu inomuchemera.<EOV><EOV>Neyi mweya yedu, Tenzi, inomutarira.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Baba, ngatizive kuti muri pano<EOV><EOV>Ngatirinzwe izwi renyu, razarurwa ndimi.<EOV><EOV>Tigadzirireyi isu vanhu venyu,<EOV><EOV>Kuti tafa mutipinze kune musha wenyu.

hymn-lyrics:
1. MTSVENE , m’tsvene, m’tsvene!

Mwari Samasimba!

Tinomukumbira pamangwanani ese,

M’tsvene, M’tsvene, m’tsvene,

Mune nyasha huru,

Umwe vatatu pamwe chetezve!



2. M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!

Vese vanodaro,

Vakahwararira pamberi penyu Mwari:

M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!

Vanomunamata

Mwakange muri, munozovazve!



3. M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!

Hatizomuoni,

Mbiri yenyu huru panyika nokudenga:

M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!

Muri m’tsvene chete,

Mwakanaka mwakachenazve!



4. M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!

Zvese zvakasikwa

Zvinokudza imwi, mukuru kune vese:

M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!

Mwakaruramisa,

Mwari mupenyu nemusikizve!
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. MTSVENE , m’tsvene, m’tsvene!<EOV><EOV>Mwari Samasimba!<EOV><EOV>Tinomukumbira pamangwanani ese,<EOV><EOV>M’tsvene, M’tsvene, m’tsvene,<EOV><EOV>Mune nyasha huru,<EOV><EOV>Umwe vatatu pamwe chetezve!<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!<EOV><EOV>Vese vanodaro,<EOV><EOV>Vakahwararira pamberi penyu Mwari:<EOV><EOV>M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!<EOV><EOV>Vanomunamata<EOV><EOV>Mwakange muri, munozovazve!<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!<EOV><EOV>Hatizomuoni,<EOV><EOV>Mbiri yenyu huru panyika nokudenga:<EOV><EOV>M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!<EOV><EOV>Muri m’tsvene chete,<EOV><EOV>Mwakanaka mwakachenazve!<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!<EOV><EOV>Zvese zvakasikwa<EOV><EOV>Zvinokudza imwi, mukuru kune vese:<EOV><EOV>M’tsvene, m’tsvene, m’tsvene!<EOV><EOV>Mwakaruramisa,<EOV><EOV>Mwari mupenyu nemusikizve!

hymn-lyrics:
1.NDIANI pane zamba

Vafudzi vopfugama?



Korus

Ndiye Jesu zvoshamisa

Ndiye mambo wokudenga

Topfugama kwaari,

Mutunidzi ndiMwari.



2. Ndiani ane nzara

Pasango ari oga?



3. Ndiani akapfava

Nedama rakanaka?



4. Ndiani anorapa

Vose vanorwadziwa?



5. Ndiani anochema

“Razaru buda muguva”?



6. Ndiani vokwazisa

Nedzimbo nokufara?



7. Ndiani ateura

Pausiku mumunda?



8. Ndiani atifira

Pam’soro pam’chinjikwa?



9. Ndiani anomuka

Isu kutinunura?



10. Ndiani pakudenga

Anotonga nesimba?
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.NDIANI pane zamba<EOV><EOV>Vafudzi vopfugama?<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus<EOV><EOV>Ndiye Jesu zvoshamisa<EOV><EOV>Ndiye mambo wokudenga<EOV><EOV>Topfugama kwaari,<EOV><EOV>Mutunidzi ndiMwari.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Ndiani ane nzara<EOV><EOV>Pasango ari oga?<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Ndiani akapfava<EOV><EOV>Nedama rakanaka?<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Ndiani anorapa<EOV><EOV>Vose vanorwadziwa?<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Ndiani anochema<EOV><EOV>“Razaru buda muguva”?<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>6. Ndiani vokwazisa<EOV><EOV>Nedzimbo nokufara?<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>7. Ndiani ateura<EOV><EOV>Pausiku mumunda?<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>8. Ndiani atifira<EOV><EOV>Pam’soro pam’chinjikwa?<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>9. Ndiani anomuka<EOV><EOV>Isu kutinunura?<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>10. Ndiani pakudenga<EOV><EOV>Anotonga nesimba?

hymn-lyrics:
1.SIMUKAI Jesu

Hondo dzake imi,

Simudzai muchinjikwa

Urege kuparadzwa,

Kukunda nokukunda

Tinotungamirwa

Kubvisa zvakaipa

Pane nyika yose.



Korus

Musimukirei

Hondo dzake imi

Simudzai muchinjikwa

Urege

Urege kuparadzwa.



2. Simukirai Jesu

Anotidaidza,

Kuenda kunorwisa

Zvinhu zvakaipa

Ngatimunamatei;

Varipo vavengi,

Tirwise nesimba

Ngatiseke ngozi.



3. Simukirai Jesu

Simba rake rose

Maoko enyama

Anozotadzisa,

Shongedzwai naKristu

Tarisa kwazvo,

Panhamu Zvimwe ngozi

Tichaita basa.



4. Simukirai Jesu

Kurwisa kopera,

Nhasi bishi rehondo

Mangwana toimba,

Kana tinozokunda,

Tinowana ngundu,

Nokugara namambo

Nokusingaperi.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.SIMUKAI Jesu<EOV><EOV>Hondo dzake imi,<EOV><EOV>Simudzai muchinjikwa<EOV><EOV>Urege kuparadzwa,<EOV><EOV>Kukunda nokukunda<EOV><EOV>Tinotungamirwa<EOV><EOV>Kubvisa zvakaipa<EOV><EOV>Pane nyika yose.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus<EOV><EOV>Musimukirei<EOV><EOV>Hondo dzake imi<EOV><EOV>Simudzai muchinjikwa<EOV><EOV>Urege<EOV><EOV>Urege kuparadzwa.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Simukirai Jesu<EOV><EOV>Anotidaidza,<EOV><EOV>Kuenda kunorwisa<EOV><EOV>Zvinhu zvakaipa<EOV><EOV>Ngatimunamatei;<EOV><EOV>Varipo vavengi,<EOV><EOV>Tirwise nesimba<EOV><EOV>Ngatiseke ngozi.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Simukirai Jesu<EOV><EOV>Simba rake rose<EOV><EOV>Maoko enyama<EOV><EOV>Anozotadzisa,<EOV><EOV>Shongedzwai naKristu<EOV><EOV>Tarisa kwazvo,<EOV><EOV>Panhamu Zvimwe ngozi<EOV><EOV>Tichaita basa.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Simukirai Jesu<EOV><EOV>Kurwisa kopera,<EOV><EOV>Nhasi bishi rehondo<EOV><EOV>Mangwana toimba,<EOV><EOV>Kana tinozokunda,<EOV><EOV>Tinowana ngundu,<EOV><EOV>Nokugara namambo<EOV><EOV>Nokusingaperi.

hymn-lyrics:
1.NGONI dzaKristu M’ponisi,

Rudo rwaBaba vedu,

Nokuwadzana koMweya,

Kuve nesu kwedenga!

Sezvo tose togarisana

Mumwe nomumwe, Ishe;

Mwoyo yedu inofara,

Nenguva dzose dzedu,

Amen.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.NGONI dzaKristu M’ponisi,<EOV><EOV>Rudo rwaBaba vedu,<EOV><EOV>Nokuwadzana koMweya,<EOV><EOV>Kuve nesu kwedenga!<EOV><EOV>Sezvo tose togarisana<EOV><EOV>Mumwe nomumwe, Ishe;<EOV><EOV>Mwoyo yedu inofara,<EOV><EOV>Nenguva dzose dzedu,<EOV><EOV>Amen.

hymn-lyrics:
1.UTIROPAFADZE , Mwari,

Enda nesu kudzimba;

Tichafunga dama rako,

Tichirirangarira:

Tinyaradze isu tose;

Simbisa mwoyo yedu

Kana tasvika kudenga,

Tichakukurumbidzai! Ameni.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.UTIROPAFADZE , Mwari,<EOV><EOV>Enda nesu kudzimba;<EOV><EOV>Tichafunga dama rako,<EOV><EOV>Tichirirangarira:<EOV><EOV>Tinyaradze isu tose;<EOV><EOV>Simbisa mwoyo yedu<EOV><EOV>Kana tasvika kudenga,<EOV><EOV>Tichakukurumbidzai! Ameni.

hymn-lyrics:
1. UYANYI , mwese mune nyota

Mumwoyo yenyu mururame,

Mwari anopa zviro zvese,

Toranyi zvino ruponeso.



2. Vatendi, muri kudaidzwa,

Uyanyi kuna Baba venyu,

Mupi wemvura inoponesa,

Murege kuzotadza zveba.



3. Uyanyi mwakasununguka,

Mutore henyu hamutengi,

Torai nyamusi ruponeso,

Musatye, anomuda mwese.



4. Uyanyi tizogara nhaka

Yababa wedu wekudenga,

Baba wevese vane zvese

Zvekukovera vanomuda.



5. Jehovha wedu wakanaka,

Hakuna umwe wakadaro;

Ngatimutende, timukudze,

Ngekuti tinotongwa ndiye.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. UYANYI , mwese mune nyota<EOV><EOV>Mumwoyo yenyu mururame,<EOV><EOV>Mwari anopa zviro zvese,<EOV><EOV>Toranyi zvino ruponeso.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Vatendi, muri kudaidzwa,<EOV><EOV>Uyanyi kuna Baba venyu,<EOV><EOV>Mupi wemvura inoponesa,<EOV><EOV>Murege kuzotadza zveba.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Uyanyi mwakasununguka,<EOV><EOV>Mutore henyu hamutengi,<EOV><EOV>Torai nyamusi ruponeso,<EOV><EOV>Musatye, anomuda mwese.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Uyanyi tizogara nhaka<EOV><EOV>Yababa wedu wekudenga,<EOV><EOV>Baba wevese vane zvese<EOV><EOV>Zvekukovera vanomuda.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Jehovha wedu wakanaka,<EOV><EOV>Hakuna umwe wakadaro;<EOV><EOV>Ngatimutende, timukudze,<EOV><EOV>Ngekuti tinotongwa ndiye.

hymn-lyrics:
1. WAGADZIRA nhasi here

Nzwimbo yake Muponesi

Yekugara mweya wake?

Wakakumirira zvino.



Korus:

Hunde ndine nzvimbo yake,

Tenzi wevatenzi vese,

Mwoyo wangu ndazarura

Kutambira Jesu Kristu.



2. Mwari wakatisikira

Kuva umba yekugara,

Anotuma Mweya M’tsvene

Kuti azogara nesu.



3. Une nzvimbo yake here,

Uyo wakakununura?

Apo wanga wakaraswa,

Wakauya kokutsvaka.



4. Haunacho chipo kwete,

Kupa kuna Mambo wako?

Asi anofadzwa kwazvo

Kutambira mwoyo wako.



5. Kuti uchimukanganwa,

Ungazoponeswa senyi,

Zvokusina rimwe zita

Reungaponeswa ndiro.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. WAGADZIRA nhasi here<EOV><EOV>Nzwimbo yake Muponesi<EOV><EOV>Yekugara mweya wake?<EOV><EOV>Wakakumirira zvino.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus:<EOV><EOV>Hunde ndine nzvimbo yake,<EOV><EOV>Tenzi wevatenzi vese,<EOV><EOV>Mwoyo wangu ndazarura<EOV><EOV>Kutambira Jesu Kristu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Mwari wakatisikira<EOV><EOV>Kuva umba yekugara,<EOV><EOV>Anotuma Mweya M’tsvene<EOV><EOV>Kuti azogara nesu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Une nzvimbo yake here,<EOV><EOV>Uyo wakakununura?<EOV><EOV>Apo wanga wakaraswa,<EOV><EOV>Wakauya kokutsvaka.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Haunacho chipo kwete,<EOV><EOV>Kupa kuna Mambo wako?<EOV><EOV>Asi anofadzwa kwazvo<EOV><EOV>Kutambira mwoyo wako.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Kuti uchimukanganwa,<EOV><EOV>Ungazoponeswa senyi,<EOV><EOV>Zvokusina rimwe zita<EOV><EOV>Reungaponeswa ndiro.

hymn-lyrics:
1.INZWA mweya wangu, Muponesi

Wako,

Ari kuti zvino “Unondida here?”

Zviro zvese pasi zvinotsakatika,

Asi rudo rwangu haruzopinduki.



2. “Kuti ukarasa rudo rwakadaro,

Unoraswa ndini, unochema kwazvo;

Une nguva zvino, ita munhu kwaye,

Kuti uchiramba une pfumvu huru”.



3. “Hauzivi here kuti zvakanyorwa,

Kuti vanotenda vachatonga pasi;

Kuti wazopedza basa rako pano,

Uchatonga neni pachigaro changu.”
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.INZWA mweya wangu, Muponesi<EOV><EOV>Wako,<EOV><EOV>Ari kuti zvino “Unondida here?”<EOV><EOV>Zviro zvese pasi zvinotsakatika,<EOV><EOV>Asi rudo rwangu haruzopinduki.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. “Kuti ukarasa rudo rwakadaro,<EOV><EOV>Unoraswa ndini, unochema kwazvo;<EOV><EOV>Une nguva zvino, ita munhu kwaye,<EOV><EOV>Kuti uchiramba une pfumvu huru”.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. “Hauzivi here kuti zvakanyorwa,<EOV><EOV>Kuti vanotenda vachatonga pasi;<EOV><EOV>Kuti wazopedza basa rako pano,<EOV><EOV>Uchatonga neni pachigaro changu.”

hymn-lyrics:
1.URI Kutambudzikirenyiko?

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Muponesi anokuponesa,

Zviudze Jesu nyamusi.



Korus:

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Ndiye shamwari nehama,

Hakuchina umwe wakadro,

Zviudze Jesu nyamusi.



2. Misondzi ngeyenyiko hama?

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Munyaradzi anokunyaradza,

Zviudze Jesu pachako.



3. Uri kutya dambudziko here?

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Uri kutya remangwana here?

Zviudze Jesu nyamusi.



4. Uri kutya rufu here, iwe?

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Uyo Jesu, zviudze Jesu

Uyo wakakunda rufu rwake,

Anozokupa rukundo.



5. Unoshaya anotungamirira,

Zviudze Jesu, zviudze Jesu,

Mweya M’tsvene ndiMutungamiri,

Zviudze Jesu, nyamusi.

hymn-lyrics:
1.MUNOITA wani imwi,

Muri kufirenyi, vanhu?

Mwari wenyu, ndinomuda,

Ndinomuda vanhu vangu;

Mwakasikwa ndini mbune,

Ngechisepe ndinomuda,

Uyai ndinomugashira,

Mune nzwimbo dzenyu kuno.



2. Munoita wani imwi,

Muri kufirenyi, vanhu?

Muponesi anobvunza,

Muri Kundirasireyi?

Ndakamutambudzikira

Kuti mwese muponeswe;

Zvino mwondiramba ngenyi?

Ndinomuda uyai henyu.



3. Munoita wani imwi,

Muri kufirenyi, vanhu?

Musapfiga mwoyo yenyu,

Regai mweya apindemwo;

Mwaudzwa karekare,

Munononokerenyiko?

Jesu anomuda asi,

Zaruranyi mwoyo yenyu.



4. Munoita wani imwi,

Muri kufirenyi, vanhu?

Ndiri kudaidza imwi

Kwupenyu hwekudenga;

Pindukanyi vanhu vangu,

Rasai zvakaipa zvese.

Swederanyi kuna Jesu,

Munosunungurwa ndiye.

hymn-selector: Hymn 125    MURAPI ari pano, chiremba wokudenga
hymn-lyrics:
1.MURAPI ari pano, chiremba wokudenga,

Wauya pasi pano korapa mwoyo yese.



Korus

Zita rakanaka, ngatimuimbire,

Ndwiyo dzeupenyu Jesu Tenzi wangu.



2. Zvitadzo anobvisa, izwanyi izwi rake,

Fambanyi zvakanaka, muite kuda kwake.



3. Hapana rimwe zita kunaka kunga Jesu,

Radzinga kutya kwangu, ndokudza zita rake.



4. Vacheche nepwere vanoda zita rake,

Vanonzwa izwi rake, vanoda basa rake.



5. Uyanyi, vashamwari, kudzanyi zita rake,

Tauranyi ngerurimi zvikomborero zvake.



6. Kudenga tikasvika, tichazoona Jesu,

Nekuimbira Jesu, navanhu vekudenga.

hymn-lyrics:
1.NHASI ngatimutondere,

Uyo wakatifira vese,

Ari kudaidza vese,

Anovada zvirokwazvo.



Korus

Uyai zvino, uyai zvino,

Uyai zvino kuna Jesu.

Musamire uyai zvino

Nguva yakanaka zvino.



2. Zvimwe mwakafamba kure

Kubva nzira yakanaka,

Jesu anosunungura

Kuti muchitenderuka.



3. Jesu anondisa avo

Vanochema ngezvitadzo,

Avovapa mwoyo mitsva

Anoita vana vake.



4. Tambirayi chipo chake,

Munopiwa ruponiso,

Tambiranyi Runyararo

Nerufaro rwakanaka.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.NHASI ngatimutondere,<EOV><EOV>Uyo wakatifira vese,<EOV><EOV>Ari kudaidza vese,<EOV><EOV>Anovada zvirokwazvo.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus<EOV><EOV>Uyai zvino, uyai zvino,<EOV><EOV>Uyai zvino kuna Jesu.<EOV><EOV>Musamire uyai zvino<EOV><EOV>Nguva yakanaka zvino.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Zvimwe mwakafamba kure<EOV><EOV>Kubva nzira yakanaka,<EOV><EOV>Jesu anosunungura<EOV><EOV>Kuti muchitenderuka.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Jesu anondisa avo<EOV><EOV>Vanochema ngezvitadzo,<EOV><EOV>Avovapa mwoyo mitsva<EOV><EOV>Anoita vana vake.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Tambirayi chipo chake,<EOV><EOV>Munopiwa ruponiso,<EOV><EOV>Tambiranyi Runyararo<EOV><EOV>Nerufaro rwakanaka.

hymn-lyrics:
1.UYAI , Mweya wakachena,

Uyai kwangu nhasi imwi;

Mune tsitsi dzakawanda,

Ndipei Mweya wenyu imwi.

Ndidzidzisei rwiyo rumwe

Rwiyo rwengirosi dzenyu,

Ndinofara ndaponeswa,

Ndizvo ndinomuimbira.



2. Ngerubatsiro rwaMwari,

Ndaapano zvino nhasi,

Kuti ndichifadza imwi,

Ndingasvika iro denga;

Jesu wakanditsvakisa

Handisakambomuziva

Akapira ropa rake

Kuti ndive noupenyu.



3. Nyasha dzenyu ndogashira

Misi yese youpenyu,

Mwoyo wangu wakaneta

Unodisa kuponeswa;

Unonyanya kutizira

Kune uyo ane nyatwa;

Torai mwoyo wangu, Baba,

Muuite wakanaka.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.UYAI , Mweya wakachena,<EOV><EOV>Uyai kwangu nhasi imwi;<EOV><EOV>Mune tsitsi dzakawanda,<EOV><EOV>Ndipei Mweya wenyu imwi.<EOV><EOV>Ndidzidzisei rwiyo rumwe<EOV><EOV>Rwiyo rwengirosi dzenyu,<EOV><EOV>Ndinofara ndaponeswa,<EOV><EOV>Ndizvo ndinomuimbira.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Ngerubatsiro rwaMwari,<EOV><EOV>Ndaapano zvino nhasi,<EOV><EOV>Kuti ndichifadza imwi,<EOV><EOV>Ndingasvika iro denga;<EOV><EOV>Jesu wakanditsvakisa<EOV><EOV>Handisakambomuziva<EOV><EOV>Akapira ropa rake<EOV><EOV>Kuti ndive noupenyu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Nyasha dzenyu ndogashira<EOV><EOV>Misi yese youpenyu,<EOV><EOV>Mwoyo wangu wakaneta<EOV><EOV>Unodisa kuponeswa;<EOV><EOV>Unonyanya kutizira<EOV><EOV>Kune uyo ane nyatwa;<EOV><EOV>Torai mwoyo wangu, Baba,<EOV><EOV>Muuite wakanaka.

hymn-lyrics:
1. MWEYA M’tsvene muri Mwari,

Ndinotambudzika,

Mwoyo wangu unochema,

Ndinomuda zvino.



Korus

Ndizadzenyi, ndizadzenyi

Uyai, Mweya zvino,

Pindai mwoyo wangu, Mweya,

Kuti ndisimbiswe.



2. Ndine nungo zviro kwazvo,

Ndinoshaya simba,

Asi mukandisimbisa,

Ndinokunda zvese.



3. Ndinoziva basa renyu

Kuti rakanaka,

Munotungamira vese

Vanomuteera.



4. Kuti ndichitungamirwa

Handichawi pasi,

Handichamusiyi Baba,

Kana nzira dzenyu.



5. Nzira dzenyu dzakanaka,

Dzine ruvheneko,

Dzine zano rokufamba

Zvakanaka kwazvo.



6. Muri mubatsiri wangu,

Mutendeki kwaye,

Avo vanomutevera

Vanokomborerwa.

hymn-lyrics:
1. INGIROSI dzinoimba,

Dzinokuwa nokufara,

Denga rese rinofadzwa,

Mazambara azarurwa;

Jesu Mambo wakauya,

Tenzi wevatendi vese;

Haleluya kuna Jesu!

Haleluya kuna Mambo!



2. Jesu watokwidzwa denga,

Ane mbiri yakakomba,

Matomupa simba rese;

Wonai ari pachigaro,

Jesu anotonga ega;

Haleluya kuna Jesu!

Haleluya kuna Mambo!



3. Jesu watokwidzwa denga,

Kuna Baba wake iyo,

Basa rake pasi pano

Rakapera zvakanaka;

Zvino ari kutunhidzwa

Ngevatsvene vekudenga;

Haleluya kuna Jesu!

Haleluya kuna Mambo!



4. Jesu watokwidzwa denga,

Zvino watogadzwa Mambo,

Anotonga nechisepe,

Mambo wedu wakanaka;

Ngatikudze zita rake;

Haleluya kuna Jesu!

Haleluya kuna Mambo!
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. INGIROSI dzinoimba,<EOV><EOV>Dzinokuwa nokufara,<EOV><EOV>Denga rese rinofadzwa,<EOV><EOV>Mazambara azarurwa;<EOV><EOV>Jesu Mambo wakauya,<EOV><EOV>Tenzi wevatendi vese;<EOV><EOV>Haleluya kuna Jesu!<EOV><EOV>Haleluya kuna Mambo!<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Jesu watokwidzwa denga,<EOV><EOV>Ane mbiri yakakomba,<EOV><EOV>Matomupa simba rese;<EOV><EOV>Wonai ari pachigaro,<EOV><EOV>Jesu anotonga ega;<EOV><EOV>Haleluya kuna Jesu!<EOV><EOV>Haleluya kuna Mambo!<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Jesu watokwidzwa denga,<EOV><EOV>Kuna Baba wake iyo,<EOV><EOV>Basa rake pasi pano<EOV><EOV>Rakapera zvakanaka;<EOV><EOV>Zvino ari kutunhidzwa<EOV><EOV>Ngevatsvene vekudenga;<EOV><EOV>Haleluya kuna Jesu!<EOV><EOV>Haleluya kuna Mambo!<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Jesu watokwidzwa denga,<EOV><EOV>Zvino watogadzwa Mambo,<EOV><EOV>Anotonga nechisepe,<EOV><EOV>Mambo wedu wakanaka;<EOV><EOV>Ngatikudze zita rake;<EOV><EOV>Haleluya kuna Jesu!<EOV><EOV>Haleluya kuna Mambo!

hymn-selector: Hymn 150     KUITA basa rake pano kusi kuda kwedu
hymn-lyrics:
1. KUITA basa rake pano kusi kuda kwedu,

Kumufunga misi yese, kunotibatsira.



2. Kufamba mune nzira iyo Jesu akafamba,

Kuda zviro zvese zvake, kunotibatsira.



3. Kuita rudo kune vese, kunga iye Jesu,

Kuzwa izwi rake dzvene, kunotibatsira.



4. Kufamba naM’ponesi wedu, kushandira vamwe,

Kuremedza zita rake, kunotibatsira.



5. Kuziva dambudzo rake iro risi rake,

Kutya Mwari zvirokwazvo, kunotibatsira.



6. Kuita izvi zvese zviro tiri pasi pano,

Tichisvika denga dzvene, iro taitirwa.



7. Kudenga tinokuwa kwazvo, taponeswa isu,

Kune denga tinofara, nekusingaperi.

hymn-lyrics:
1. NAMATANYI , vanamati,

Musanete imwi, kwete;

Kwanga kune shirikadzi,

Haisakaneta iyo.



2. Nhambwe zhinji yakauya

Kukumbira ‘yo mutongi,

“Nditongere mhosva dzangu.”

Nguva ndefu wakaramba.



3. Gare-gare wakazoti,

“Kana ini ndisingatyi

Mwari kana umwe munhu,

Yandinetsa shirikadzi.”



4. “Ndoitonga mhosva yayo,

Pararanyi mhandu dzake,

Regeranyi kumunetsa;

Fara hako, shirikadzi.”



5. Jesu wakatakura kuti

Mwari achavapindura

Avo vanomudaidza

Masikati neusiku.

hymn-lyrics:
1. JESU ndishamwari wedu,

Mutakuri wakanaka,

Tinokomborerwa kwazvo,

Tine hama yakadai;

Kuti tichimukumbira,

Anofadzwa kupindura,

Anotipa zvakanaka,

Hatichazoshayi chiro.



2. Kuti tine dambudziko,

Kana tine rurunziro,

Hatizovi neurombo,

Tinotenda kuna Jesu;

Hatina imwe hama

Yakanaka kunga iye,

Anoziva vanhu vese,

Mukumbire anokuzwa,



3. Kuti tisisine simba,

Rekuita basa redu,

Jesu anotibatsira,

Anotipa simba rake;

Kana kuti takatukwa,

Tinonyararidzwa ndiye,

Jesu ndishamwari wedu,

Rudo rwake rwakanaka.

hymn-lyrics:
1. NDITUNGAMIRENYI , Baba,

Nditungamirenyi kwadi,

Ndinofara ndiri wenyu,

Ndinomuda nguva dzese.



Korus:

Baba, Baba,

Nditungamirenyi nhasi,

Kuti ndisasiya nzira,

Nditungamirenyi, Baba.



2. Muri bako rakanaka

Mumadambudziko ese,

Ndachengetwa ndiri wenyu,

Ndinokoya rudo rwenyu.



3. Tenzi, nditungamirenyi

Misi yese youpenyu,

Kune nyika yekudenga,

Kune musha wakanaka.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. NDITUNGAMIRENYI , Baba,<EOV><EOV>Nditungamirenyi kwadi,<EOV><EOV>Ndinofara ndiri wenyu,<EOV><EOV>Ndinomuda nguva dzese.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus:<EOV><EOV>Baba, Baba,<EOV><EOV>Nditungamirenyi nhasi,<EOV><EOV>Kuti ndisasiya nzira,<EOV><EOV>Nditungamirenyi, Baba.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Muri bako rakanaka<EOV><EOV>Mumadambudziko ese,<EOV><EOV>Ndachengetwa ndiri wenyu,<EOV><EOV>Ndinokoya rudo rwenyu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Tenzi, nditungamirenyi<EOV><EOV>Misi yese youpenyu,<EOV><EOV>Kune nyika yekudenga,<EOV><EOV>Kune musha wakanaka.

hymn-lyrics:
1.BABA wedu wakatsidza,

“Ndinokutungamirira”

Kuti usarasikeba

Parwendo kune denga



Korus:

“Ndinokutungamirira,”

Ndinokutungamirira

Pakukwira kune denga.

“Ndinokutungamirira,”



2. Apo unotambudzika,

Nekushaya zano zviya,

Unofadzwa nge’ya mazwi,

“Ndinokutungamirira,”



3. Kuti hama dzako dzafa,

Uchidzichemera kwazvo,

Unafunga aya mazwi,

“Ndinokutungamirira,”



4. Apo unokomborerwa,

Mwoyo wako unofara,

Unadisa aya mazwi,

“Ndinokutungamirira,”



5. Mangwana ese ese,

Unokarakadza iye,

Nechitsidzo chakanaka,

“Ndinokutungamirira,”



6. Apo unobata basa,

Unafunga mazwi ake

Uyo wakakutsidzira,

“Ndinokutungamirira,”



7. Apo unorara pasi,

Paisiku uri wega,

Unatenda aya mazwi,

“Ndinokutungamirira,”

hymn-selector: Hymn 145    CHINYARARA , mwoyo wangu, Jesu ndiye Mwari
hymn-lyrics:
1.CHINYARARA , mwoyo wangu, Jesu ndiye Mwari,

Zviro zvese zviri pasi zvakasikwa ndiye.



Korus:

Kristu uyanyi, Kristu uyanyi,

Hunde, uyai, Tenzi.



2. Chinyarara, mwoyo wangu, Jesu Mambo kwaye,

Unotenda kuna Mwari, tenda kuna Jesu.



3. Chinyarara, mwoyo wangu, unokomborerwa,

Haugari nguva ndefu, uchasvika denga.4. Chinyarara, mwoyo wangu, Jesu anowaka

Imba yako yakanaka kune denga rake.



5. Chinyarara, mwoyo wangu, Jesu ndiye Mwari,

Kuda kwake kwakanaka, ngakuitwe ndiwe.

hymn-lyrics:
1.MUKRISTU ari mukomborerwi,

Ane M’ponesi mukuru,

Mumwoyo wake anozwa simba,

Ane M’ponesi mukuru.



Korus:

Jesu, Jesu, M;ponesi mukuru, ndinaye

Jesu, Jesu, M;ponesi mukuru, ndinaye.



2. Parwendo rwake rwepasi pano

Ane M’ponesi mukuru;

Watumwa pasi ndiBaba wake,

Ane M’ponesi mukuru.



3. Wafadzwa kwazvo ngezviro zvake

Ane M’ponesi mukuru,

Rufaro rwake haruzoperi,

Ane M’ponesi mukuru.4. Panzira yake kudenga tsvene

Ane M’ponesi mukuru,

Haane chiroba chomutyisa,

Ane M’ponesi mukuru.



5.Mazuva ese panzvimbo dzese

Ane M’ponesi mukuru,

Mudambudziko remwoyo wake

Ane M’ponesi mukuru.



6. Kudenga iro kusingaperi

Ane M’ponesi mukuru,

Anodenyiko kupinda iye,

Ane M’ponesi mukuru.

hymn-lyrics:
1.HAKUNA zita sera Jesu,

Kana nokudenga,

Hakuna rimwe rakadaro,

Zita raM’ponesi.



Korus:

Tinoda kuimbira Jesu,

Tichimupa mbiri,

Ngekuti hatizivi zita

Rinokunda iri.



2. NdiJesu wakafira vese,

Wakatida kwazvo,

Zvotanga takaraswa zvedu.

Ngezvitadzo zvedu.



3. NdiJesu wakaita nyasha,

Takamukanganwa,

Wakati, “Enda hako mwana,

Usazotadzazve.”



4. NdiJesu wakarapa vanhu,

Akavasimbisa,

NdiJesu wakamutsa vafi

Kune hama dzavo.



5. NdiJesu anoenda nesu

Kwese tinoenda,

NdiJesu anotibatsira

Muupenyu hwedu.

hymn-lyrics:
1.HAKUNA hama kupinda Jesu,

Hakunaba, hakuchina.

Hakuna umwe kurapa vese,

Hakunaba, hakuchina.



Korus:

Jesu ndiye shamwari yedu,

Anonatsa kutungamira,

Hakuna umwe kupinda Jesu,

Hakunaba, hakuchina.



2. Hakuna mumwe mukuru zveba.

Hakunaba, hakuchina.

Hakuna umwe mununudziri,

Hakunaba, hakuchina.



3. Hakuna chipo chikuru zveba,

Hakunaba, hakuchina.

Hakuna umwe kurapa mwoyo,

Hakunaba, hakuchina.



4. Hakuna nguva tisingaonwi,

Hakunaba, hakuchina.

Hapana nzvimbo asingazivi,

Hakunaba, hakuchina.

hymn-lyrics:
1.TORA zita rake Jesu,

Ngeurombo kwako hwese

Rinokupa simba rake,

Rekukunda zvirunziro.



Korus:

Zita rake rakanaka,

Mwenje wedu pasi pano,

Zita rake rakanaka,

Mwenje wedu pasi pano.



2. Jesu ndimurwiri wedu,

Ndiye simba redu rese,

Tinokunda zvakaipa

Ngero zita rake Jesu.



3. Kunzwa zita rake Jesu

Tinonyararidzwa kwazvo,

Tinopfugamira pasi,

Mwoyo inomuwombera.



4. Mwoyo yadziyirwa kwazvo

Kunzwa zita rake Jesu,

Uyo wakatitambira,

Wakaita mwoyo mitsva



5. Iro Zita rake Jesu

Rinotipa runyararo,

Ndizvo ngatiritondere

Nzwimbo dzese tinoenda.

hymn-selector: Hymn 170     VANHU vese vakanaka vanotaura diko
hymn-lyrics:
1. VANHU vese vakanaka vanotaura diko,

Usanyepe, kwete, kwete, taura zvirokwazvo.



Korus:

Taurai z vediko, taurai zvediko,

Idi rakanaka.



2. Mwari anodisa kwazvo vanotaura diko



Anoziva vana vake vanodiswa idi.



3. Anania na Safira vakanyepa kare,

Vakazofa pakarepo nekunyepa kwavo.



4. Ngatitaure zvirokwazvo, tisanyepe, kwete,

Ngatiite vanhu kwavo kutaura idi.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. VANHU vese vakanaka vanotaura diko,<EOV><EOV>Usanyepe, kwete, kwete, taura zvirokwazvo.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus:<EOV><EOV>Taurai z vediko, taurai zvediko,<EOV><EOV>Idi rakanaka.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Mwari anodisa kwazvo vanotaura diko<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Anoziva vana vake vanodiswa idi.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Anania na Safira vakanyepa kare,<EOV><EOV>Vakazofa pakarepo nekunyepa kwavo.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Ngatitaure zvirokwazvo, tisanyepe, kwete,<EOV><EOV>Ngatiite vanhu kwavo kutaura idi.

hymn-lyrics:
1. KWANGA kune m’kadzi kare

Zita rake Dorka,

Wakanga akanaka diko,

Vese vakamuda.



2. Nemabhachi wakaruka

Zvipo zvevarombo

Wakadisa vanhu vese,

Vese vakaziva.



3. Kuvarombo nevarwere

Dorka waienda,

Wakateurira ivo,

Akavapa zvipo.



4. Kuti tine Mweya M’tswene,

Tinodisa vese,

Tinofara kubatsira

Vese vanoshaya.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. KWANGA kune m’kadzi kare<EOV><EOV>Zita rake Dorka,<EOV><EOV>Wakanga akanaka diko,<EOV><EOV>Vese vakamuda.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Nemabhachi wakaruka<EOV><EOV>Zvipo zvevarombo<EOV><EOV>Wakadisa vanhu vese,<EOV><EOV>Vese vakaziva.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Kuvarombo nevarwere<EOV><EOV>Dorka waienda,<EOV><EOV>Wakateurira ivo,<EOV><EOV>Akavapa zvipo.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Kuti tine Mweya M’tswene,<EOV><EOV>Tinodisa vese,<EOV><EOV>Tinofara kubatsira<EOV><EOV>Vese vanoshaya.

hymn-lyrics:
1. MWARI wakaudza, izvo unokusha

Ngezve unocheka, ngezve unopiwa,

Ndizvo tisaite zviro tisafunga,

Zvotichazvicheka izvo Tinoita.



Korus:

Izvo unokusha, ndizvo unocheka,

Izvo unokusha, ndizvo unocheka,

Ndizvo ngatikushe mbeu dzakanaka

Kuti tizogara mumba dzokudenga.



2. Izvo unoona, unokusha mbeu,

Kuti zvakanana, ngezve unocheka

Izvo zveunozwa, unokusha mbeu,

Kuti zvakashata, ngezve unocheka.



3. Izvo unorerwa, unokusha mbeu,

Kuti zvakanaka, ngezve unocheka,

Izvo unoita, unokusha mbeu,

Kuti zvakashata, ngezve unocheka.



4. Izvo unoshanda, unokusha mbeu,

Kuti zvakanaka, ngezve unocheka.

Izvo unoshanda, unokusha mbeu,

Kuti zvakashata, ngezve unocheka.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. MWARI wakaudza, izvo unokusha<EOV><EOV>Ngezve unocheka, ngezve unopiwa,<EOV><EOV>Ndizvo tisaite zviro tisafunga,<EOV><EOV>Zvotichazvicheka izvo Tinoita.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus:<EOV><EOV>Izvo unokusha, ndizvo unocheka,<EOV><EOV>Izvo unokusha, ndizvo unocheka,<EOV><EOV>Ndizvo ngatikushe mbeu dzakanaka<EOV><EOV>Kuti tizogara mumba dzokudenga.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Izvo unoona, unokusha mbeu,<EOV><EOV>Kuti zvakanana, ngezve unocheka<EOV><EOV>Izvo zveunozwa, unokusha mbeu,<EOV><EOV>Kuti zvakashata, ngezve unocheka.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Izvo unorerwa, unokusha mbeu,<EOV><EOV>Kuti zvakanaka, ngezve unocheka,<EOV><EOV>Izvo unoita, unokusha mbeu,<EOV><EOV>Kuti zvakashata, ngezve unocheka.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Izvo unoshanda, unokusha mbeu,<EOV><EOV>Kuti zvakanaka, ngezve unocheka.<EOV><EOV>Izvo unoshanda, unokusha mbeu,<EOV><EOV>Kuti zvakashata, ngezve unocheka.

hymn-lyrics:
1. ZANO chiro chakanaka,

Tese tinorida kwazvo,

Zano haritengwi, kwete,

Riri chipo chaJehovha.



2. Izwi rake rine zano

Kusimudza vanhu vese,

Riri simba remarudzi,

Riri idi remakore.



3. Nge’ro zano tine simba

Rekuita zvakanaka,

Asi rinouya basi

Kune avo vanomuda.



4. Soromoni wakarida,

Akarikumbira Mwari,

Ndizvo Mwari wakamupa

Zano, pfuma, nerukudzo.



5. Apo tinoshaya zano

Ngatiuye kuna iye

Uyo ane rakakwana,

Kupa kune vanhu vese.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. ZANO chiro chakanaka,<EOV><EOV>Tese tinorida kwazvo,<EOV><EOV>Zano haritengwi, kwete,<EOV><EOV>Riri chipo chaJehovha.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Izwi rake rine zano<EOV><EOV>Kusimudza vanhu vese,<EOV><EOV>Riri simba remarudzi,<EOV><EOV>Riri idi remakore.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Nge’ro zano tine simba<EOV><EOV>Rekuita zvakanaka,<EOV><EOV>Asi rinouya basi<EOV><EOV>Kune avo vanomuda.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Soromoni wakarida,<EOV><EOV>Akarikumbira Mwari,<EOV><EOV>Ndizvo Mwari wakamupa<EOV><EOV>Zano, pfuma, nerukudzo.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Apo tinoshaya zano<EOV><EOV>Ngatiuye kuna iye<EOV><EOV>Uyo ane rakakwana,<EOV><EOV>Kupa kune vanhu vese.

hymn-lyrics:
1. KUEDZA kwazosvika,

Kwadzinga dima rese,

Vamuka vanhu vese

Kudzidza Jesu Kristu;

Masoko akanaka

Ouya misi yese,

Ekuti vadzimambo

Vanoda vafundisi.



2. Onanyi vanhu vcdu

Vakuteura zvino,

Nevamwe vari kure

Vakuwombere, Jesu;

Vapwere vaakuimba

Zviimbo zvakanaka,

Vava kuita basa

RaMwari Baba wedu.



3. Onanyi va’avazhinji

Vanoda kudzidziswa,

Kufamba mune nzira

Yevanhu vakanaka;

Majaha nemhandara

Vanoda ruponeso,

VaBaba nevamai

Vanoda nzira itsva.



4. Rwasvika ruponeso

RwaMwari nyika dzese,

Rwofadza kure-kure

Kundudzi dzese dzese;

Tapota imwi, Baba,

Pamsana pake Jesu,

Kuvaponesa avo

Vagere mune dima.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. KUEDZA kwazosvika,<EOV><EOV>Kwadzinga dima rese,<EOV><EOV>Vamuka vanhu vese<EOV><EOV>Kudzidza Jesu Kristu;<EOV><EOV>Masoko akanaka<EOV><EOV>Ouya misi yese,<EOV><EOV>Ekuti vadzimambo<EOV><EOV>Vanoda vafundisi.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Onanyi vanhu vcdu<EOV><EOV>Vakuteura zvino,<EOV><EOV>Nevamwe vari kure<EOV><EOV>Vakuwombere, Jesu;<EOV><EOV>Vapwere vaakuimba<EOV><EOV>Zviimbo zvakanaka,<EOV><EOV>Vava kuita basa<EOV><EOV>RaMwari Baba wedu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Onanyi va’avazhinji<EOV><EOV>Vanoda kudzidziswa,<EOV><EOV>Kufamba mune nzira<EOV><EOV>Yevanhu vakanaka;<EOV><EOV>Majaha nemhandara<EOV><EOV>Vanoda ruponeso,<EOV><EOV>VaBaba nevamai<EOV><EOV>Vanoda nzira itsva.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Rwasvika ruponeso<EOV><EOV>RwaMwari nyika dzese,<EOV><EOV>Rwofadza kure-kure<EOV><EOV>Kundudzi dzese dzese;<EOV><EOV>Tapota imwi, Baba,<EOV><EOV>Pamsana pake Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Kuvaponesa avo<EOV><EOV>Vagere mune dima.

hymn-lyrics:
1. MUZUNDE renyu, Baba,

Mune basa rekuita,

Vanhu havazivi imwi,

Vanogara mune dima,

Havazivi nzira tsvene,

Havazivi Jesu Kristu,

Murumbwana wenyu chete,

Havazivi rudo rwenyu.



Korus:

Ndiri pano, Tenzi nditumenyi

Kune avo vanoshaya.



2. Ndiri pano nditumenyi

Kune avo vanoshaya,

Mudikani, Tenzi wangu,

Soko renyu ndingatora,

Kana vanhu vandivenga,

Sezvo imwi mwakavengwa,

Kuti muchindituma’yo

Ndingafara kushandira.



3. Taurai, Tenzi, soko renyu,

Taurai, Tenzi, ndiri kuzwa,

Kuda kwenyu ngakuitwe

Sezvo munondiudzira,

Ndiudzirei mazwi enyu

Kuti ndipe kune vanhu,

Ndiudzirei mazwi enyu,

Enyu basi, Tenzi wangu.



4. Kuti muchienda neni,

Kuti muchindisimbisa,

Handizotyi madambudzo.

Kana basa richikonja;

Mwakatsidza kuva neni

Kuti ndichagara nemwi;

Munamato wangu ndiwo,

“Ndiri pano nditumenyi.”

hymn-lyrics:
1. KWESE kwese tinoona

Vanhu havazivi Kristu,

Vakarasikirwa, diko,

Vanotadza Muponesi.



Korus:

Mwari wedu, wemasimba,

Tizwei tinomukumbira,

Tumai vafundisi kuno,

Kune nyika dima.



2. Vatumenyi mangwanani,

Vatumenyi pamauro,

Vatumenyi masikati,

Kune misha yavo yese.



3. Asi isu, Baba wedu,

Tine basa rekuita,

Tine hama neshamwari,

Titumenyi kuna ivo.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. KWESE kwese tinoona<EOV><EOV>Vanhu havazivi Kristu,<EOV><EOV>Vakarasikirwa, diko,<EOV><EOV>Vanotadza Muponesi.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus:<EOV><EOV>Mwari wedu, wemasimba,<EOV><EOV>Tizwei tinomukumbira,<EOV><EOV>Tumai vafundisi kuno,<EOV><EOV>Kune nyika dima.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Vatumenyi mangwanani,<EOV><EOV>Vatumenyi pamauro,<EOV><EOV>Vatumenyi masikati,<EOV><EOV>Kune misha yavo yese.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Asi isu, Baba wedu,<EOV><EOV>Tine basa rekuita,<EOV><EOV>Tine hama neshamwari,<EOV><EOV>Titumenyi kuna ivo.

hymn-lyrics:
1. NGATIENDE , vadikani,

Kune munda wake Tenzi,

Unodiwa vekurima,

NdiSamunda wadidza



Korus:

Kasikai kuendayo,

Kune zunde rake Mambo;

Endai iyo, endai iyo,

Kune zunde rake Mambo.



2. Jesu wati kuna Pita,

“Chitevera sure kwangu,

Unozovabvuwa vanhu,”

Kubva mune dima guru.



3. Jesu Tenzi watiudza,

“Endai kune pasi pese,

Muchiparidzira izwi

Kune ndudzi dzese dzese.”



4. Zvino rava jana redu

Rekutora iri soko

Kuna ivo vari kure,

Vasikamuzivi Tenzi.



5. Jesu wati “Kumbiranyi

Vapupuri kuna Ishe,

Zvokwasvika kupupura

Vashomana vapupuri.”

hymn-lyrics:
1. FAMBANYIWO , majoni,

AMwari wedu imwi,

Musatye mhandu dzenyu,

Hadzina simba, kwete;

Tinozokunda kwazvo

Panyika kwese kwese,

Masimba ake, Jesu,

Haachazokundwiba.



2. Fambanyiwo vatendi

VaMwari wedu imwi,

Hamuna simba mwega,

Musazvikudze zvenyu;

Mupfeke nhumbi dzese

DzaMwari wakanaka,

Muende kune basa,

Muite vanhu imwi.



3. Fambanyiwo vatsvene,

Munyika dzese dzese,

Mushumaire izwi

RaJesu Tenzi wedu;

Mukundi uchapiwa

Chiremba cheupenyu,

Anozoona Jesu,

Atonge naye iyo.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. FAMBANYIWO , majoni,<EOV><EOV>AMwari wedu imwi,<EOV><EOV>Musatye mhandu dzenyu,<EOV><EOV>Hadzina simba, kwete;<EOV><EOV>Tinozokunda kwazvo<EOV><EOV>Panyika kwese kwese,<EOV><EOV>Masimba ake, Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Haachazokundwiba.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Fambanyiwo vatendi<EOV><EOV>VaMwari wedu imwi,<EOV><EOV>Hamuna simba mwega,<EOV><EOV>Musazvikudze zvenyu;<EOV><EOV>Mupfeke nhumbi dzese<EOV><EOV>DzaMwari wakanaka,<EOV><EOV>Muende kune basa,<EOV><EOV>Muite vanhu imwi.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Fambanyiwo vatsvene,<EOV><EOV>Munyika dzese dzese,<EOV><EOV>Mushumaire izwi<EOV><EOV>RaJesu Tenzi wedu;<EOV><EOV>Mukundi uchapiwa<EOV><EOV>Chiremba cheupenyu,<EOV><EOV>Anozoona Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Atonge naye iyo.

hymn-lyrics:
1. NGATIITE zvakanaka

Kune avo Vanochema,

Ngatiite zvakanaka

Kune vanotambudzika;

Kuti tizokomborerwa

Parwendo rwedu pano,

Ngaticherechedze avo

Vane mwoyo yeurombo.



Korus:

Nguva yedu ipfupi kwazvo,

Nguva yedu ipfupi kwazvo,

Hatizivi musi uyo

Mwari anotidaidza.



2. Ngatitaurire avo

Vanoshaya Muponesi,

Vakarasa nzira dzavo,

Va’akufamba kune rufo,

Kuti tizofara kwazvo

Ngeupenyu hworutendo,

Ngatishinge kutaura

Kuti tinopona senyi.



3. Vese avo vari sure

Vanoona nzira dzedu,

Vadikanwi vari sure

Vanofunga nzira dzedu;

Ngatifambe zvakanaka

Pane nzira muupenyu,

Mwoyo izokura kwazvo

Nerutendo kuna Jesu.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. NGATIITE zvakanaka<EOV><EOV>Kune avo Vanochema,<EOV><EOV>Ngatiite zvakanaka<EOV><EOV>Kune vanotambudzika;<EOV><EOV>Kuti tizokomborerwa<EOV><EOV>Parwendo rwedu pano,<EOV><EOV>Ngaticherechedze avo<EOV><EOV>Vane mwoyo yeurombo.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus:<EOV><EOV>Nguva yedu ipfupi kwazvo,<EOV><EOV>Nguva yedu ipfupi kwazvo,<EOV><EOV>Hatizivi musi uyo<EOV><EOV>Mwari anotidaidza.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Ngatitaurire avo<EOV><EOV>Vanoshaya Muponesi,<EOV><EOV>Vakarasa nzira dzavo,<EOV><EOV>Va’akufamba kune rufo,<EOV><EOV>Kuti tizofara kwazvo<EOV><EOV>Ngeupenyu hworutendo,<EOV><EOV>Ngatishinge kutaura<EOV><EOV>Kuti tinopona senyi.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Vese avo vari sure<EOV><EOV>Vanoona nzira dzedu,<EOV><EOV>Vadikanwi vari sure<EOV><EOV>Vanofunga nzira dzedu;<EOV><EOV>Ngatifambe zvakanaka<EOV><EOV>Pane nzira muupenyu,<EOV><EOV>Mwoyo izokura kwazvo<EOV><EOV>Nerutendo kuna Jesu.

hymn-lyrics:
1. Mambo Jesu watidaidza

Kuchidyo chake chokudenga

Tomira sei pakutongwa

Mambo apinda.



Korus

Apo Mambo apinda, kuzotitonga

Tinomira sei apo, Mambo apinda.



2. Mambo Jesu ane chiremba

Pakange pazoiswa minzwa

Nembiri yake tichaona

Mambo apinda.



3. Zvakaipa zvichaonekwa

Kuti tamira pakutongwa

Zvemumoyo zvichaonekwa

Mambo apinda.



4. Achafara pakutiona, kuti tapfeka

Nguwo Chena

Ndizvo kunesu kunonaka

Mambo apinda.



5. Tenzi tinokuimbira mutsa

Kuti tose tigozomira

Munzvimbo dzedu nokusatya

Mambo apinda.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. Mambo Jesu watidaidza<EOV><EOV>Kuchidyo chake chokudenga<EOV><EOV>Tomira sei pakutongwa<EOV><EOV>Mambo apinda.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus<EOV><EOV>Apo Mambo apinda, kuzotitonga<EOV><EOV>Tinomira sei apo, Mambo apinda.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Mambo Jesu ane chiremba<EOV><EOV>Pakange pazoiswa minzwa<EOV><EOV>Nembiri yake tichaona<EOV><EOV>Mambo apinda.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Zvakaipa zvichaonekwa<EOV><EOV>Kuti tamira pakutongwa<EOV><EOV>Zvemumoyo zvichaonekwa<EOV><EOV>Mambo apinda.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Achafara pakutiona, kuti tapfeka<EOV><EOV>Nguwo Chena<EOV><EOV>Ndizvo kunesu kunonaka<EOV><EOV>Mambo apinda.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Tenzi tinokuimbira mutsa<EOV><EOV>Kuti tose tigozomira<EOV><EOV>Munzvimbo dzedu nokusatya<EOV><EOV>Mambo apinda.

hymn-lyrics:
1. Tarirai kune nyika uko!

Nokutenda tovona iyo

Bambo vedu vanogarapo,

Vachingogadzirira isu



Korus:

Tichando farawo,

Musi watichazosvika ko

Tichando, tichando farawo,

Musi watichazosvikako.



2. Tichazondoimbira apo;

Nziyo dzavadikanwa vashe;

Mweya yedu ichafara vo,

Ichingozorodziwa naye.



3. Tichandovunganira apo,

Tichandokudza zita raShe;

Nyasha yake tichavonga vo,

Tazopiwa zororo naye.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. Tarirai kune nyika uko!<EOV><EOV>Nokutenda tovona iyo<EOV><EOV>Bambo vedu vanogarapo,<EOV><EOV>Vachingogadzirira isu<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus:<EOV><EOV>Tichando farawo,<EOV><EOV>Musi watichazosvika ko<EOV><EOV>Tichando, tichando farawo,<EOV><EOV>Musi watichazosvikako.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Tichazondoimbira apo;<EOV><EOV>Nziyo dzavadikanwa vashe;<EOV><EOV>Mweya yedu ichafara vo,<EOV><EOV>Ichingozorodziwa naye.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Tichandovunganira apo,<EOV><EOV>Tichandokudza zita raShe;<EOV><EOV>Nyasha yake tichavonga vo,<EOV><EOV>Tazopiwa zororo naye.

hymn-lyrics:
1. Ndinosimuda SHE,

Kundibetsera,

Nzwi renyu ndigonzwa

Kundinyaradza.



Korus:

Ndotsvaka imi moga,

Mwoyo wangu womushuva

Nditaririre Jesu,

Ndinyaradzei!



2. Ndinosimuda, SHE!

Sarai neni;

Ndingazokunda vo

Muri pandiri!



3. Ndinosimuda, SHE!

Pandinofara;

Pandotambura vo,

Musandisiya!



4. Ndinosimuda, SHE!

Ndinatswe chose;

Ndimushumire vo

Nomwoyo wose!
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. Ndinosimuda SHE,<EOV><EOV>Kundibetsera,<EOV><EOV>Nzwi renyu ndigonzwa<EOV><EOV>Kundinyaradza.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus:<EOV><EOV>Ndotsvaka imi moga,<EOV><EOV>Mwoyo wangu womushuva<EOV><EOV>Nditaririre Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Ndinyaradzei!<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Ndinosimuda, SHE!<EOV><EOV>Sarai neni;<EOV><EOV>Ndingazokunda vo<EOV><EOV>Muri pandiri!<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Ndinosimuda, SHE!<EOV><EOV>Pandinofara;<EOV><EOV>Pandotambura vo,<EOV><EOV>Musandisiya!<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Ndinosimuda, SHE!<EOV><EOV>Ndinatswe chose;<EOV><EOV>Ndimushumire vo<EOV><EOV>Nomwoyo wose!

hymn-lyrics:
1. Chinjikano ndirero

Tsime rweupenyu;

Rinopodza vose

She vanouya kwenyu.



Korus:

Ipapo, Ipapo, Jesu ndichakudza;

Kusvikira ikweyo ndichimurumbiza.



2. Chinjikano, ipapo

Ndanga ndichihuta;

Bva nenyasha ndipapo

Pandakazofara.



3. Maratidza ipapo

Tsitsi dzenyu huru;

Zvino mundibetserei

Kuifunga kwazvo!



4. Ndorambira ipapo,

Ndichitenda kwoga;

Pamwe handizivi’po.

Asi apo poga.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. Chinjikano ndirero<EOV><EOV>Tsime rweupenyu;<EOV><EOV>Rinopodza vose<EOV><EOV>She vanouya kwenyu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus:<EOV><EOV>Ipapo, Ipapo, Jesu ndichakudza;<EOV><EOV>Kusvikira ikweyo ndichimurumbiza.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Chinjikano, ipapo<EOV><EOV>Ndanga ndichihuta;<EOV><EOV>Bva nenyasha ndipapo<EOV><EOV>Pandakazofara.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Maratidza ipapo<EOV><EOV>Tsitsi dzenyu huru;<EOV><EOV>Zvino mundibetserei<EOV><EOV>Kuifunga kwazvo!<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Ndorambira ipapo,<EOV><EOV>Ndichitenda kwoga;<EOV><EOV>Pamwe handizivi’po.<EOV><EOV>Asi apo poga.

hymn-lyrics:
1. HATINA musha panyika,

Hatifari kuva pano,

Zvinofadza mweya yedu

Kutsvaka musha unouya.



2. Hatinamusha panyika,

Tinoda musha uri kure,

Zita rawo iZioni

Unopenya nguva dzese.



3. Musha une runyararo

Vafambi vachazorora,

Dai ndine mapapiro,

Ndaiuya ndizorore.



4. Mweya wangu Chinyarara

Mwari Anoziva nguva,

Ndichaita kuda kwake,

Iye wondipa zororo.

hymn-selector: Hymn 185     APO Jesu anouya kotora varume
hymn-lyrics:
1. APO Jesu anouya kotora varume,

Anotora vakanaka, avo vanomuda.



Korus:

Vanhu vake vatsvene, vasine zvitema

Vanotenda kudenga kugara naJesu.



2. Apo Jesu anouya kotora vakadzi,

Anotora vakanaka, avo vanomuda.



3. Apo Jesu anouya kotora vacheche,

Anotora vakanaka avo vanomuda.



4. Vana vake pasi pano, uyanyi kwaari,

Anomuda zvirokwazvo ngerudo rukuru.



5. Ngatiedze misi yese kufadza M’ponesi,

Kuti tizotorwa ndiye kudenga kumsoro.

hymn-lyrics:
1. JESU unondida, Bible rinodaro,

Vana vanomuda, Jesu unovada.



Korus:

Vanhu vake vatsvene, vasine zvitema,

Vanoenda kudenga kugara naJesu.



2. Jesu Unondida, wakasiya denga

Akadzika pasi, kuponesa ini.



3. Jesu wakandida, wakazarurira

Nzira yekudenga, kuti ndizopinde.



4. Jesu Unondida, unofamba neni.

Kuti ndikamuda unozonditora.

hymn-lyrics:
1. TIRI pano pamwe tese.

Tachengetwa gore rino,

Ngatikudze Mwari wedu

NaM’ponesi weduuzve



2. Gore rakapfuura,

Takaona madambudzo,

Asi takapiwa simba,

Hatisakakundwaba



3. Ndiye Mwari wakanaka,

Wakatiponesa tese,,

Tinondongwarirwa ndiye,,

Takasviswa ndiye ‘She



4. Ndizvo ngatitaurirane,

Nyasha dzake dzinokwana,,

Idzo dzinotiponesa,

Kuti tisatadzezve.



5. Basa rake ngatibate,,

Tisaneta kuribata,,

Ngatitsidzirane nhasi,,

Tisasiya Mwariba.



6. Tese tinofarisana,

Kuonana usu hwedu,,

Tiri pamwe tese zvino,

Nevakuru veduzve.



7. Vamwe vedu vakatorwa,,

Basa ravo rakapera,,

Zvino vanoona Mwari,

Vanoona Jesuzve.

hymn-lyrics:
1. KARE Mwari wakasika

M’rume nomukadzi wake,

Vese vanga vakanaka

Apo vakasikwa ndiye;

Mwari anokohomedza

Kuti vanhu vatinhidzwa,

Ngavasiye baba, mai,

Vatorane nekudana



2. Iri jaha nemhandara

Vanouya kutinhidzwa,

Kuva m’rume nomukadzi

Ngemutemo wenyu, Baba;

Ndizvo tinomukumbira,

Vaitenyi nyama imwe,

Ngavapiwe mwoyo umwe

Kuti vazobatsirana.



3. Vabatsirenyi mumba mwoyo,

Muupenyu hwavo hutsva;

Vhenekerai mwoyo yavo

Nekuvatungamirira;

Ngavapiwe simba zvino

Vaifambe nzira yenyu

Misi yese yeupenyu,

Mwari, Baba, Mubatsiri.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1. KARE Mwari wakasika<EOV><EOV>M’rume nomukadzi wake,<EOV><EOV>Vese vanga vakanaka<EOV><EOV>Apo vakasikwa ndiye;<EOV><EOV>Mwari anokohomedza<EOV><EOV>Kuti vanhu vatinhidzwa,<EOV><EOV>Ngavasiye baba, mai,<EOV><EOV>Vatorane nekudana<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Iri jaha nemhandara<EOV><EOV>Vanouya kutinhidzwa,<EOV><EOV>Kuva m’rume nomukadzi<EOV><EOV>Ngemutemo wenyu, Baba;<EOV><EOV>Ndizvo tinomukumbira,<EOV><EOV>Vaitenyi nyama imwe,<EOV><EOV>Ngavapiwe mwoyo umwe<EOV><EOV>Kuti vazobatsirana.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Vabatsirenyi mumba mwoyo,<EOV><EOV>Muupenyu hwavo hutsva;<EOV><EOV>Vhenekerai mwoyo yavo<EOV><EOV>Nekuvatungamirira;<EOV><EOV>Ngavapiwe simba zvino<EOV><EOV>Vaifambe nzira yenyu<EOV><EOV>Misi yese yeupenyu,<EOV><EOV>Mwari, Baba, Mubatsiri.

hymn-lyrics:
1. TENZI , takavaka umba yenyu,

Nzvimbo umwo tinomuwombera,

Takafara kuvakira imwi;

Komborerai, Tenzi, basa redu.



2. Isu tese takabatsirana

Kuivaka, vamwe ngematope,

Mari, uswa, miti, mvura, mabwe.

Komborerai, Tenzi, basa redu.



3. Ngarikudzwe zita renyu muno,

Ngatidzidze nzira dzenyu, Baba,

Kuti tichiite kuda kwenyu;

Komborerai, Tenzi, basa redu.



4. Tamuteta, Mwari wekudenga,

Vana vedu ngavadzidze muno,

Rudo, nduramiso runyararo;

Komborerai, Tenzi, basa redu.



5. Nhasi tinopira iyi imba

Kushandira basa renyu pano,

Nemakore achauya, Baba;

Komborerai, Tenzi basa renyu.

hymn-lyrics:
1.JESU ndinokuda M’ponisi wangu,

Ndasiya zvose zvakaipa zvangu,

Iwe M’sununguri, Iwe Muchengeti,

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndinokuda Jesu.

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndokuda zvino.



2. Ndokuda nokuti Iwe wandida,

Wakandiroverwa pamuchinjikwa,

Ndokuda nokuti wakandifira,

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndinokuda Jesu.

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndokuda zvino.



3.Ndinogokuda ndichiri mupenyu,

Ndichakurumbidza mazuva ose,

Nomusi wokufa ndinogoimba,

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndinokuda Jesu.

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndokuda zvino.



4.Kakare, kana ndiriko kudenga,

Ndichagara newe, ndichakukudza,

Ndichaimba kwazvo navanhu vose,

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndinokuda Jesu.

Ndinokuda Jesu, ndokuda zvino.

hymn-lyrics:
1.MUNUNURI ndinomuda,

Kuti unondiponesa

Ndinobviswa pano rufu,

Ndinopinzwa paupenyu.



2. Mununuri ndinomuda

Kuti wandiregerera;

Wandiparadzira ropa,

Wakaripa mhosva yangu.



3. Mununuri ndinomuda,

Kuti wakandishambidza;

Wandibisa zvakaipa,

Nezvitadzo zvangu zvose.



4. Mununuri ndinomuda,

Kuti wandivhenekera;

Wabisa upofu hwose,

Wandiburitsira mwenje.



5. Mununuri ndinomuda,

Unondiperekedza

Izwi rake ndiwo mwenje

Wokuchenga tsoka dzangu.



6. Mununuri ndinomuda,

Kuti unondiyamura,

Kana ndiri pakurwara,

Ndinosimbiswa pabasa.



7. Mununuri ndinomuda,

Kuti uri simba rangu,

Unondifadza pamwoyo,

Unokunda dzose hondo.



8. Mununuri ndinomuda,

Rakakomba zita rake:

Ngandikwaniswe ini

Pano rununuro rwake.

hymn-lyrics:
1.JESU, iwe uri nzira,

Toenda newe kudenga,

Unotitungamirira,

Tiponiswe pakaipa.



2. Jesu, uri zvirokwazvo,

Nawo ose manzwi ako;

Namakuhwa akaipa

Mberi kwamaziso ako.



3. Uri Jesu woupenyu,

Tingapone newe tose;

Kunozodaro rapinda

Pakudenga tive newe.



4. Nzira kwayo youpenyu,

Tokutenda isu tose;

Nayo yose mwoyo yedu

Tinotenda nguva dzose.

hymn-lyrics:
1.IRO zita raJesu,

Iguru rakakura;

Rinodiwa kudenga

Rinotyiwa panyika;

Iguru kuvatendi,

Rokudzwa nokuimba.



2. Iro zita raJesu,

Ragam’chirwa nom’tadzi,

Rodambura makashu

ASatani okuipa;

Wakatenda kwariri

Wamutswa pano rufu.



3. Iro zita raJesu,

Ndokudza iro roga;

Nomusi wandoenda,

Ndozoreva pakufa;

Nezita rake Jesu,

Ndigoenda kudenga.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.IRO zita raJesu,<EOV><EOV>Iguru rakakura;<EOV><EOV>Rinodiwa kudenga<EOV><EOV>Rinotyiwa panyika;<EOV><EOV>Iguru kuvatendi,<EOV><EOV>Rokudzwa nokuimba.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Iro zita raJesu,<EOV><EOV>Ragam’chirwa nom’tadzi,<EOV><EOV>Rodambura makashu<EOV><EOV>ASatani okuipa;<EOV><EOV>Wakatenda kwariri<EOV><EOV>Wamutswa pano rufu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Iro zita raJesu,<EOV><EOV>Ndokudza iro roga;<EOV><EOV>Nomusi wandoenda,<EOV><EOV>Ndozoreva pakufa;<EOV><EOV>Nezita rake Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Ndigoenda kudenga.

hymn-lyrics:
1.TINE chipo chakakomba

Chatakapiwa iyesu;

Tachipiwa naJehovha,

Icho chipo chatinacho.



2. Chakomba ichi chipo,

Kwavari vakachiwana;

Vanochida kwazvo icho,

Pamusoro pezvinhu zvose.



3. Chine simba icho chipo,

Kwavari vakachiwana;

Choupenyu icho chipo,

Kwavari vakachigam’chira.



4. Icho chipo ndiye Jesu,

Chatakapiwa iyesu;

Uri chipo chakakomba,

Kwavari vanomutenda.



5. Tinomutenda Jehovha,

Naicho chipo chikuru;

Tinom’tenda Mwari oga,

Nokutipa mwana wake.

hymn-lyrics:
1.N’ANGA huru yava pedyo,

Une tsitsi ndiJesu;

Anoda kutifarisa,

Inzwa izwi raJesu.



Korus Korus

Rwiyo rwakanakisa,

Zita rakanakisa,

Rumbo rwakanakisa,

Jesu, Ishe, Jesu.



2.Waregerwa zvakaipa,

Inzwa izwi raJesu;

Famba zvakanaka uko,

Uende kuna Jesu.



3. Utsvene huri kwaari,

Zvino ndotenda Jesu;

Ndinorida zita rake,

Zita raKristu Jesu.



4. Kutya kwangu kwaparadzwa,

Nero zita raJesu.

Mwoyo wangu unofara

Kunzwa zita raJesu.



5. Kana tichikwira uko,

Tisvike kuna Jesu;

Tichakurumbidza zita,

Zita raShe Jesu.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.N’ANGA huru yava pedyo,<EOV><EOV>Une tsitsi ndiJesu;<EOV><EOV>Anoda kutifarisa,<EOV><EOV>Inzwa izwi raJesu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>Korus Korus<EOV><EOV>Rwiyo rwakanakisa,<EOV><EOV>Zita rakanakisa,<EOV><EOV>Rumbo rwakanakisa,<EOV><EOV>Jesu, Ishe, Jesu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2.Waregerwa zvakaipa,<EOV><EOV>Inzwa izwi raJesu;<EOV><EOV>Famba zvakanaka uko,<EOV><EOV>Uende kuna Jesu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3. Utsvene huri kwaari,<EOV><EOV>Zvino ndotenda Jesu;<EOV><EOV>Ndinorida zita rake,<EOV><EOV>Zita raKristu Jesu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Kutya kwangu kwaparadzwa,<EOV><EOV>Nero zita raJesu.<EOV><EOV>Mwoyo wangu unofara<EOV><EOV>Kunzwa zita raJesu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Kana tichikwira uko,<EOV><EOV>Tisvike kuna Jesu;<EOV><EOV>Tichakurumbidza zita,<EOV><EOV>Zita raShe Jesu.

hymn-lyrics:
1.CHANGAMIRE , Muponisi

Ishe wakambozvidzwa;

Nezvirwadzo zvako, tenzi,

Kwakwaniswa kupona.

Changamire, Mambo Jesu!

Mutakuri wemhosva;

Nako kufa kwakakomba

Takapiwa upenyu.



2. Gwayana raMwari baba

Tonamata kwauri;

Ropa rakaparadzirwa

Isu vakarasika.

Vanhu vako vose, Ishe

Vakatengerwa nzwimbo;

Vakazarurirwa musuwo

Webako rokudenga.



3.Changamire! Wakagadzwa

Pachigaro chitswene,

Hondo dzose dzokudenga

Dzinokukurumbidza.

Unoteurira isu,

Unotireverera;

Pamusha wako mutswene

Unoda kutipinza.



4. Wafanira kugam’chira

Kukudzwa noutsvene;

Kukurumbidzwa kukuru,

Rudo rusingaperi.

Tiyamurei ngirozi,

Uyai nenziyo dzenyu;

Tose tiimbire Mambo

Tine mwoyo michena
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.CHANGAMIRE , Muponisi<EOV><EOV>Ishe wakambozvidzwa;<EOV><EOV>Nezvirwadzo zvako, tenzi,<EOV><EOV>Kwakwaniswa kupona.<EOV><EOV>Changamire, Mambo Jesu!<EOV><EOV>Mutakuri wemhosva;<EOV><EOV>Nako kufa kwakakomba<EOV><EOV>Takapiwa upenyu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Gwayana raMwari baba<EOV><EOV>Tonamata kwauri;<EOV><EOV>Ropa rakaparadzirwa<EOV><EOV>Isu vakarasika.<EOV><EOV>Vanhu vako vose, Ishe<EOV><EOV>Vakatengerwa nzwimbo;<EOV><EOV>Vakazarurirwa musuwo<EOV><EOV>Webako rokudenga.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3.Changamire! Wakagadzwa<EOV><EOV>Pachigaro chitswene,<EOV><EOV>Hondo dzose dzokudenga<EOV><EOV>Dzinokukurumbidza.<EOV><EOV>Unoteurira isu,<EOV><EOV>Unotireverera;<EOV><EOV>Pamusha wako mutswene<EOV><EOV>Unoda kutipinza.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Wafanira kugam’chira<EOV><EOV>Kukudzwa noutsvene;<EOV><EOV>Kukurumbidzwa kukuru,<EOV><EOV>Rudo rusingaperi.<EOV><EOV>Tiyamurei ngirozi,<EOV><EOV>Uyai nenziyo dzenyu;<EOV><EOV>Tose tiimbire Mambo<EOV><EOV>Tine mwoyo michena

1.NGATITENDE kuna Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Nokuti watifira;<EOV><EOV>Wakatiitira tsitsi<EOV><EOV>Nokutifira kwake;<EOV><EOV>Ishe, Baba!<EOV><EOV>Iva netsitsi nesu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2.Isu vanhu vamapofu,<EOV><EOV>Wakauya kunesu;<EOV><EOV>Wakatifira vanhu vose,<EOV><EOV>Wakatifira mapofu;<EOV><EOV>Ishe, Baba!<EOV><EOV>Iva netsitsi nesu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3.Vatema naivo vachena,<EOV><EOV>Vatende pamwe chete;<EOV><EOV>Ngavakurumbidze vese,<EOV><EOV>Vaimbe kuna Ishe;<EOV><EOV>Ishe, Baba!<EOV><EOV>Iva netsitsi nesu.

hymn-lyrics:
1.URI Mwari Muponisi,

Wakaita zvose;

Uri Mwari Muponisi,

Wakakurumbira.



2. Wave munhu Muponisi

Nokuipa kwedu

Wave munhu Muponisi,

Wakafira isu



3.Une tsitsi Muponisi

Navari pamhosva;

Une tsitsi Muponisi

Navari pakufa.



4. Wachimbidza Muponisi

Kuzotipindura;

Wachimbidza Muponisi,

Kutisunungura.



5. Une simba Muponisi

Rokutiponesa;

Une simba Muponisi

Rokutifadzisa.



6. Uno rudo Muponisi,

Une tsitsi nesu;

Uno rudo Muponisi

Ngatimude iye.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.URI Mwari Muponisi,<EOV><EOV>Wakaita zvose;<EOV><EOV>Uri Mwari Muponisi,<EOV><EOV>Wakakurumbira.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Wave munhu Muponisi<EOV><EOV>Nokuipa kwedu<EOV><EOV>Wave munhu Muponisi,<EOV><EOV>Wakafira isu<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3.Une tsitsi Muponisi<EOV><EOV>Navari pamhosva;<EOV><EOV>Une tsitsi Muponisi<EOV><EOV>Navari pakufa.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4. Wachimbidza Muponisi<EOV><EOV>Kuzotipindura;<EOV><EOV>Wachimbidza Muponisi,<EOV><EOV>Kutisunungura.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Une simba Muponisi<EOV><EOV>Rokutiponesa;<EOV><EOV>Une simba Muponisi<EOV><EOV>Rokutifadzisa.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>6. Uno rudo Muponisi,<EOV><EOV>Une tsitsi nesu;<EOV><EOV>Uno rudo Muponisi<EOV><EOV>Ngatimude iye.

hymn-lyrics:
1.TSITSI hedzi dzamira dzega,

Nezvirwadzo zvakamira zvoga,

Nengoni dzakamira dzoga,

Pamuchinjikwa.



2. Ishe waburuka kudenga,

Akazova munhu kuvanhu,

Akava diramhamba redu,

Pamuchinjikwa.



3.Rutendo rwedu rwomirepi?

Kufunga kwedu kwomirepi?

Norudo rwedu rwomirepi

Pamuchinjikwa.



4.Tsaona ingaperi yose,

Nemhaka dzose dzingaripwe;

Zvakaipa zvinoregerwa;

Pamuchinjikwa.



5 Dzakaona ngirozi pasi,

Dzakati gwanamwana pasi,

Dzichiona mashure ayo!

Pamuchinjikwa.

hymn-lyrics:
1.WATAKURA kuipa Jesu,

kusi kuipa kwako;

Ukaripa mhosva Jesu,

Isi mhoswa yako.



2. Waiva munhu unetsitsi

Usatadza Iwe;

Raparara ropa rako,

Wakanaka iwe.



3.Kudarika kwedu kwose,

Kwakanyorwa newe;

Nezvirandu zvedu zvose,

Zvakanyorwa newe.



4.Taregerwa taponiswa,

Nezvirwadzo zvako,

Tinoshambwa pakaipa

Nero ropa rako.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.WATAKURA kuipa Jesu,<EOV><EOV>kusi kuipa kwako;<EOV><EOV>Ukaripa mhosva Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Isi mhoswa yako.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Waiva munhu unetsitsi<EOV><EOV>Usatadza Iwe;<EOV><EOV>Raparara ropa rako,<EOV><EOV>Wakanaka iwe.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3.Kudarika kwedu kwose,<EOV><EOV>Kwakanyorwa newe;<EOV><EOV>Nezvirandu zvedu zvose,<EOV><EOV>Zvakanyorwa newe.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4.Taregerwa taponiswa,<EOV><EOV>Nezvirwadzo zvako,<EOV><EOV>Tinoshambwa pakaipa<EOV><EOV>Nero ropa rako.

hymn-lyrics:
1.URI mupenyu Muponisi,

Uri mupenyu iye;

Tafariswa isu vanhu,

Uri mupenyu iye.



2. Wanga wafa Muponisi,

Wanga wafa iye;

Wabayirwa isu vanhu,

Wabaiwa iye.



3.Wakakwira kudenga,

Wakakwira iye;

Utiteurire isu,

Oteura iye.



4.Unotonga Muponisi,

Unotonga isu

Taponiswa pakaipa,

Taponiswa isu.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.URI mupenyu Muponisi,<EOV><EOV>Uri mupenyu iye;<EOV><EOV>Tafariswa isu vanhu,<EOV><EOV>Uri mupenyu iye.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Wanga wafa Muponisi,<EOV><EOV>Wanga wafa iye;<EOV><EOV>Wabayirwa isu vanhu,<EOV><EOV>Wabaiwa iye.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3.Wakakwira kudenga,<EOV><EOV>Wakakwira iye;<EOV><EOV>Utiteurire isu,<EOV><EOV>Oteura iye.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4.Unotonga Muponisi,<EOV><EOV>Unotonga isu<EOV><EOV>Taponiswa pakaipa,<EOV><EOV>Taponiswa isu.

hymn-lyrics:
1.TARIRAI mudzione

Netsitsi dzakanyanyisa,

Dzakarehwa noMuponisi,

Wakafira isu vanhu.



2. Tanga tichitamba parima,

Tisina chatiedzera:

Tanga tichifamba tichitadza,

Tisaziva kururama.



3.Watitusa Iwe, Mwari,

Netsitsi dzako ihuru;

Wakatipa Mwana wako,

Wakatiedzera naye.



4.Tinotenda Iwe, Jesu,

Isu vanhu vakaipa;

Wakaripa kuipa kwedu,

Wakatakura iye oga.



5. Iwe, Mweya woutswene,

Uya uve nesu tose,

Utituse, tikuone

Apo pakaitwa newe.
delimited-hymn-lyrics: 1.TARIRAI mudzione<EOV><EOV>Netsitsi dzakanyanyisa,<EOV><EOV>Dzakarehwa noMuponisi,<EOV><EOV>Wakafira isu vanhu.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>2. Tanga tichitamba parima,<EOV><EOV>Tisina chatiedzera:<EOV><EOV>Tanga tichifamba tichitadza,<EOV><EOV>Tisaziva kururama.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>3.Watitusa Iwe, Mwari,<EOV><EOV>Netsitsi dzako ihuru;<EOV><EOV>Wakatipa Mwana wako,<EOV><EOV>Wakatiedzera naye.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>4.Tinotenda Iwe, Jesu,<EOV><EOV>Isu vanhu vakaipa;<EOV><EOV>Wakaripa kuipa kwedu,<EOV><EOV>Wakatakura iye oga.<EOV><EOV><EOV><EOV>5. Iwe, Mweya woutswene,<EOV><EOV>Uya uve nesu tose,<EOV><EOV>Utituse, tikuone<EOV><EOV>Apo pakaitwa newe.

hymn-lyrics:
1.KRISTU , Imanueri!

NdiMwari nomunhu!

Tinotenda uyu musi

Wokuuya kwako.



2. Unotifugisa

Nokupfava kwako:

Uno munhu sowaMwari,

Ukava muranda.



3.Uko kuita kwako

Wakuitira isu,

Tigoti nebasa rako

Tionewo nzira.



4.Tanga tarasika

Nokuipa kwedu,

Wakauya kutidzora

Kune chakaipa.



5. Wati uri nzira,

Iyo yechokwadi

Vose vanofamba nayo

Vochiwana ngoni.



6. Zvino toti Jesu

Tikukurumbidze,

Tinoimba tichifara

Nokuuya kwako.

hymn-lyrics:
1.RUMBIDZAI , vanhu mose!

Zvirumbidze, zvinhu zvose!

Nhasi musi wokukudza

Nhasi musi werufaro.



2. Mununuri wakazvarwa,

Rufaro rwakauyiswa,

Nhasi tsitsi dzakauya,

Nhasi kupona kwakauya.



3.Haana kuuya sehondo,

Fambisai idzi nhau,

Kuti nedzo tsitsi dzake

Wauya kuzotifira.



4.Fambisai idzi nhau

Dziende panyika yose.

Tendaika vanhu mose!

Nezvinhu zvose zvitende!
